TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartManager extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable
Public Class WebPartManager Inherits Control Implements INamingContainer, IPersonalizable
public ref class WebPartManager : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::IPersonalizable

summary.span: 用作 Web 部件控件集的中心类，管理所有 Web 部件控件、功能和网页上发生的事件。

span.span: Serves as the central class of the Web Parts control set, managing all the Web Parts controls, functionality, and events that occur on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件充当 Web 部件应用程序的中心或控制中心。The control acts as the hub or control center of a Web Parts application. 必须有一个-且只有一个-使用 Web 部件控件的每一页上的控件实例。There must be one--and only one-- control instance on every page that uses Web Parts controls. 与 Web 部件应用程序的大多数方面控件仅适用于经过身份验证的用户。As with most aspects of Web Parts applications, the control works only with authenticated users. 此外，其功能几乎完全使用驻留在继承自的 Web 部件区域内的服务器控件的工作原理类。Further, its functionality works almost entirely with server controls that reside within Web Parts zones that inherit from the class. 驻留在这些区域之外的页的服务器控件可以具有很少 Web 部件功能或与交互控件。Server controls that reside on a page outside of these zones can have very little Web Parts functionality or interaction with the control. 作为在页中，Web 部件功能的中心控件可执行的下表中所述的任务类型。As the hub for Web Parts functionality on a page, the control carries out the kinds of tasks described in the following table. |任务类别Task category|控件的作用What the control does| |-------------------|---------------------------| |跟踪 Web 部件控件Tracking Web Parts controls|将跟踪的许多不同类型的提供 Web 部件功能，包括页面上的控件控件、 连接、 区域和其他人。Keeps track of the many different kinds of controls on a page that provide Web Parts features, including controls, connections, zones, and others.| |添加和删除 Web 部件控件Adding and removing Web Parts controls|提供用于添加、 删除和关闭方法页面上的控件。Provides the methods for adding, deleting, and closing controls on a page.| |管理连接Administering connections|创建控件，之间的连接，并监视连接，以及添加和删除它们的进程。Creates connections between controls, and monitors the connections as well as the processes of adding and removing them.| |个性化设置的控件和页Personalizing controls and pages|使用户能够将控件移至不同的位置，在页中，并将启动用户可以在其中编辑外观、 属性和控件的行为的视图。Enables users to move controls to different locations on a page, and launches the views in which users can edit the appearance, properties, and behavior of controls. 维护每一页上的特定于用户的个性化设置。Maintains user-specific personalization settings on each page.| |不同的页视图之间切换Toggling between different page views|切换不同的页上，专用视图之间的页，以便用户可以执行某些任务，例如更改页面布局或编辑控件。Switches a page among different specialized views of the page, so that users can carry out certain tasks such as changing page layout or editing controls.| |引发 Web 部件生命周期事件Raising Web Parts life-cycle events|定义，将引发，并使开发人员能够处理的 Web 部件控件，例如当控件在添加、 移动、 已连接，或删除的生命周期事件。Defines, raises, and enables developers to handle life-cycle events of Web Parts controls, such as when controls are being added, moved, connected, or deleted.| |启用导入和导出的控件Enabling import and export of controls|导出包含的属性的状态的 XML 流控件，并允许用户方便起见，在对其他页或站点中的复杂控件进行个性化设置的文件中导入。Exports XML streams that contain the state of the properties of controls, and allows users to import the files for convenience in personalizing complex controls in other pages or sites.| 类具有大量的属性。The class has a large set of properties. 与一致跟踪其他控件的角色，它具有多个引用的 Web 部件控件或其他特殊的 Web 部件对象集合的属性。Consistent with the role of tracking other controls, it has a number of properties that reference collections of either Web Parts controls, or other special Web Parts objects. ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和属性都是使用的所有集合为其跟踪和其他控件管理任务。The , , , , , , , and properties are all collections used by the control for its tracking and other management tasks. 另一组属性包含在 Web 部件应用中发生的某些方案中应用的可自定义警告。Another group of properties contains customizable warnings that apply in certain scenarios that occur in a Web Parts application. 其中包括、 ，和属性。These include the , the , and the properties. 类重写一些由许多 Web 服务器控件使用其基继承属性。The class overrides some of its base inherited properties, which are used by many Web server controls. 其中包括， ，和属性。These include the , , and properties. 最后，没有可用于访问应用程序的当前状态的一组属性。Finally, there is a group of properties useful for accessing the current state of the application. 属性指示的页是中的当前显示模式。The property indicates the current display mode that a page is in. 属性指示是否允许控件呈现客户端脚本，这是在其中的用户可能具有不同的功能的浏览器，或者是否关闭了脚本的情况下相关。The property indicates whether a control is allowed to render client-side script, which is relevant in situations where users might have browsers with different capabilities or have scripting turned off. 属性都引用包含对许多重要的扩展性情况下使用的 Web 部件方法调用一个实用工具类很有用。The property is useful for referencing a utility class that contains the calls to a number of important Web Parts methods that are used for extensibility cases. 通过隐藏对一个单独的类中的这些方法的调用 (类)，则简化类自己的 API。By hiding the calls to these methods in a separate class (the class), the class's own API is simplified. 属性提供访问权限的个性化设置对象，用于存储用户的个性化设置和数据保存到永久存储。The property provides access to the personalization objects that store users' personalization settings and persist that data to permanent storage. 属性指示其用户或应用程序当前选择页上的控件。The property indicates which control on a page is currently selected by the user or the application. 属性指示是否在自定义个性化数据控制已更改。The property indicates whether custom personalization data on a control has changed. 控件包含五个内置的显示模式或网页的视图。The control contains five built-in display modes, or views of a Web page. 开发人员可以扩展此功能，通过扩展类型，如创建自定义显示模式类或类。Developers can extend this feature, creating custom display modes by extending types such as the class or the class. 用户可以将页切换到不同的显示模式中，假设的适当类型的对应于给定的显示模式的控件出现在页面上。Users can switch a page into the various display modes, provided that the proper kind of controls that correspond to a given display mode are present on a page. > [!NOTE] > 它是可以扩展此功能，以便用户可以切换到自定义显示模式，而无页上的相应区域。It is possible to extend this feature so that users can switch into a custom display mode without having a corresponding zone on the page. 但是，默认行为是显示模式对应区域。However, the default behavior is that display modes correspond to zones. 标准显示模式中的公共字段由表示类。The standard display modes are represented by public fields in the class. 下表总结了字段和其所指的显示模式。The following table summarizes the fields and the display modes they refer to. 页的当前显示模式如上所述，始终在中引用属性和可以在给定的种类的页，存在的区域的特定页的显示模式集包含在属性。The current display mode of a page, as noted above, is always referenced in the property, and the set of display modes that is possible on a particular page, given the kind of zones that are present on the page, is contained in the property. |字段Field|显示模式的详细信息Display mode details| |-----------|--------------------------| ||Web 页; 的普通用户视图默认和最常见的显示模式。The normal user view of a Web page; the default and most common display mode.| ||用户可以重新排列或删除控件，若要更改页面布局视图。The view in which users can rearrange or delete controls to change the page layout.| ||该视图在其中编辑的用户界面 (UI) 变得可见，则用户可以编辑外观、 属性和控件的正常浏览模式中可见的行为。The view in which an editing user interface (UI) becomes visible; users can edit the appearance, properties, and behavior of the controls that are visible in the normal browse mode.| ||该视图中的目录用户界面变得可见，则用户可以从目录的可用控件，向页面添加控件。The view in which a catalog UI becomes visible; users can add controls to a page from catalogs of available controls.| ||在其中连接 UI 变得可见，则该视图用户可以连接、 管理或断开控件之间的连接。The view in which a connection UI becomes visible; users can connect, manage, or disconnect connections between controls.| 控件还包含在 Web 部件页面和控件的生命周期中非常重要的事件数。The control also contains a number of events that are critical in the life cycle of Web Parts pages and controls. 这些事件提供对 Web 部件控件的行为的精确进行编程控制。These events provide precise programmatic control over the behavior of Web Parts controls. 大多数方法适用于控件 (或位于其他服务器或用户控件区域，以便它们可以充当控件)。Most methods pertain directly to controls (or other server or user controls that are placed in zones so that they can behave as controls). 但是，有些事件有关的页面或页上的连接状态。However, a few events pertain to the state of the page or connections on the page. 下表列出了可用的事件，并总结了它们的用途。The following table lists the available events and summarizes their purposes. > [!NOTE] > 在下表中的所有情况下，"控件"一词是指控件或任何服务器控件位于某个区域中，使用包装在运行时的对象。In all cases in the following table, the word "control" refers to a control or any server control that resides in a zone and is wrapped with a object at run time. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||将控件添加到页上，以确认它授权之前发生。Occurs just before a control is added to a page to verify that it is authorized.| ||在页面上的所有连接已都激活后发生。Occurs after all the connections on a page have been activated.| ||激活页上的所有连接的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of activating all the connections on a page.| ||页的当前显示模式更改后发生。Occurs after the current display mode of a page has changed.| ||更改页面的显示模式的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of changing a page's display mode.| ||已取消所选内容的控件后发生。Occurs after the selection of a control has been canceled.| ||取消所选控件的内容的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of canceling the selection of a control.| ||控件添加到区域后发生。Occurs after a control has been added to a zone.| ||将控件添加到区域的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of adding a control to a zone.| ||控件已关闭 （从页中移除） 后发生。Occurs after a control has been closed (removed from a page).| ||关闭控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of closing a control.| ||永久删除动态控件 （一种以编程方式创建或添加从目录） 的实例后发生。Occurs after an instance of a dynamic control (one that was created programmatically or added from a catalog) has been permanently deleted.| ||恰好在删除动态控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of deleting a dynamic control.| ||控件具有在其区域内移动或移动到另一个区域后发生。Occurs after a control has moved within its zone or to another zone.| ||恰好在移动控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of moving a control.| ||两个控件选择来参与连接建立连接后发生。Occurs after two controls selected for participation in a connection have established the connection.| ||连接两个控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of connecting two controls.| ||已断开连接的两个控件后发生。Occurs after two connected controls have been disconnected.| ||恰好在断开连接两个控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of disconnecting two controls.| 控件具有很多用于管理 Web 部件页的方法。The control has numerous methods for managing Web Parts pages. 此处未列出的方法一大组是其名称采用的形式在方法*EventName*。A large set of the methods, not listed here, are methods whose names take the form of On*EventName*. 这些方法通常引发其关联的事件，并且使用类型的处理程序提供事件。These methods typically raise their associated event, and provide the event with a handler of type . 开发人员继承自可重写这些方法中的大多数类。Most of these methods can be overridden by developers who inherit from the class. 此外，页开发人员可以使用这些方法关联的事件提供自定义处理程序。Also, page developers can provide custom handlers for the events associated with these methods. 例如中的情况下事件，无法添加页开发人员`OnWebPartAdded`属性设为``以及 Web 页上，然后分配自定义的方法名称添加到该属性提供的事件自定义处理标记中的元素。For example, in the case of the event, a page developer could add an `OnWebPartAdded` attribute to the `` element in the markup of a Web page, and then assign a custom method name to the attribute to provide custom handling for the event. 属性对应于方法和事件处理大多数 Web 部件事件和其关联的方法的工作方式此基本模式。The attribute corresponds to the method, and this basic pattern of event handling works for most Web Parts events and their associated methods. 此外，控件具有方法特定于的管理任务控件 (和服务器或用户控件用作控件)。In addition, the control has methods particular to the task of managing controls (and server or user controls used as controls). 这些方法包括， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。These methods include , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 另一组方法专用于连接。Another set of methods is specialized for connections. 这包括方法如， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。This includes methods such as , , , , , , , , , and . 最后，一些方法专注于个性化功能。Finally, some methods focus on personalization functionality. 其中包括， ， ， ， ， ，和。These include , , , , , , and . 有关其他详细信息方法可通过访问属性，请参阅的文档类。For more information on other methods that are accessible through the property, see the documentation for the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates both declarative and programmatic use of the control. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含两个自定义网页可连接控件和``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 用户控件具有显示可能的显示模式在页上，提供在页上存在的 Web 部件控件的下拉列表框控件。The user control has a drop-down list control that shows the possible display modes on a page, given the Web Parts controls that are present on the page. 在此代码示例的 Web 页中，此用户控件声明的正下方页面的标记中的元素，并且没有`Register`指令要注册此控件的 Web 页的顶部附近。In the Web page for this code example, this user control is declared just below the element in the page's markup, and there is a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page to register the control. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 网页的声明性标记包含`Register`为用户控制和自定义控件的指令。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 没有``元素，``元素以包含自定义控件和``元素。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 此页还包含一些处理连接相关的事件的内联代码控制; 连接和断开连接控件时，你可以看到此代码的作用。The page also contains some inline code that handles connection-related events for the control; you can see the effect of this code as you connect and disconnect controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/webpartmanagerConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/webpartmanagerConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分是控件的源代码。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 请注意，没有名为接口`IZipCode`，而在中实现此接口`ZipCodeWebPart`类。Note that there is an interface named `IZipCode`, and this interface is implemented in the `ZipCodeWebPart` class. 此类具有一个名为的特殊的回调方法`ProvideIZipCode`充当提供程序。This class has a special callback method named `ProvideIZipCode` that serves as a provider. 其他类型，名为`WeatherWebPart`，还具有一个名为的特殊方法实现`GetIZipCode`，以便在要充当其他控件的使用者的控件。The other type, named `WeatherWebPart`, is also implemented with a special method named `GetIZipCode`, which enables the control to act as a consumer of the other control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定你具有源代码编译到程序集和`Register`网页中的指令引用的程序集名称。This code example assumes that you have compiled the source into an assembly, and the `Register` directive in the Web page references the assembly name. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 你已加载浏览器中的 Web 页后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**连接**切换页后，可以连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以启用你创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单中，，然后单击**连接**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 连接用户界面显示后，请单击**创建使用者连接**链接。After the connection UI appears, click the **Create a connection to a Consumer** link. 单元格将显示包含一个下拉列表框控件。A cell appears that has a drop-down list control. 选择**天气控件**在下拉列表中，然后单击**连接**来完成这两个控件的连接。Select **Weather Control** in the drop-down list, and then click **Connect** to complete the connection of the two controls. 单击**关闭**，然后使用**显示模式**下拉列表来返回到正常浏览模式的页。Click **Close**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode. 你可以输入邮政编码，然后使用者控件将使用你输入的值更新。You can enter a ZIP Code, and the consumer control will be updated with the value you enter. 因为`ZipCode`属性已标记有`Personalizable`在源代码中，此属性的值的属性将保留在浏览器会话，从而节省了由用户输入的值。Because the `ZipCode` property was marked with the `Personalizable` attribute in the source code, this property value will persist across browser sessions, thus saving the value entered by a user. 更复杂的使用者控件无法执行邮政编码信息、 查找天气信息根据的代码，并向用户显示。A more sophisticated consumer control could take the ZIP code information, look up weather information based on the code, and display it to a user.

para.span: 控件专为进行扩展。

span.span: The control is designed to be extended.

para.span: 因为它是，因此必须还扩展到 Web 部件应用程序，当你想要扩展某些特定类型或在 Web 部件控件集，在许多情况下控制中部类，因为它是可能会有一些属性或使所需的方法 自定义类型的 Web 部件应用程序上下文中的工作。

span.span: Because it is so central to Web Parts applications, when you want to extend some specific type or control in the Web Parts control set, in many cases you must also extend the class, because it is likely to have some property or method that is required to make your custom type work in the context of a Web Parts application.

para.span: Web 部件参考文档 (请参阅)，讨论如何扩展 Web 部件在键入时，经常需要进行扩展的提及类，或演示如何扩展中的代码示例。

span.span: The Web Parts reference documentation (see ), when discussing how to extend a Web Parts type, frequently mentions what needs to be done to extend the class as well, or shows how to extend it in a code example.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化所使用的几个重要变量控件。The constructor initializes several important variables used by the control. 直接影响所有 Web 部件页的一个分配是默认页面显示模式设置为浏览模式的事实 ()。One assignment that directly impacts all Web Parts pages is the fact that the default page display mode is set to browse mode ().

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ActivateConnections() cil managed

summary.span: 激活网页上当前所有非活动连接。

span.span: Makes active all connections on a Web page that are currently inactive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 到页上的每个请求以激活之间的现有连接上调用方法和驻留在其他服务器控件区域。The method is called on each request to a page to activate existing connections between and other server controls residing in zones. 在某些情况下，例如，如果存在冲突的连接被激活，则此方法中反过来调用方法来结束有问题的连接。In some cases, for instance if there is a conflict in the connections being activated, this method in turn calls the method to end the problematic connection. 断开连接的过程引发事件。During the disconnection process the event is raised. 通常，开发人员可以取消此事件，但在这种情况，这是不能取消的连接中冲突，因为控件需要为了完成激活连接的过程中解决该冲突。Normally developers can cancel this event, but in the case where this is a conflict among the connections it cannot be cancelled, because the control needs to resolve the conflict in order to finish the process of activating connections. 有关详细信息，请参阅事件。For details, see event.

summary.span: 提供向网页添加 控件的标准编程方法。

span.span: Provides the standard programmatic method for adding controls to a Web page.

returns.span: 添加到页的 控件。

span.span: A control that was added to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用这两个添加新的动态控制到页中，并重新打开以前已关闭在页面上的静态或动态控件。The method is used both to add new dynamic controls to a page, and to reopen static or dynamic controls that have previously been closed on a page. 当调用该方法时若要添加新控件时，它实际创建一份所引用的控件`webPart`参数。When the method is called to add a new control, it actually creates a copy of the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter. 一个新的 ID 生成的控件，复制，因此，开发人员应引用从要获取新的 ID 值的方法返回的控件。A new ID is generated for the copy of the control, so developers should reference the control returned from the method to get the new ID value. 当调用方法以重新打开以前关闭的控件时，它将返回对所引用的控件的直接引用`webPart`参数。When the method is called to reopen a previously closed control, it returns a direct reference to the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应始终使用方法，而不是方法的引用的控件的集合属性，以将添加以编程方式控制到页中，因为使用方法将引发异常。You should always use the method, rather than the method of the collection of controls referenced by the property, to add controls programmatically to the page, because using the method throws an exception. 若要添加不是控件控件 (换而言之，一个将使用自动换行的服务器控件控件在运行时)，首先应调用方法以创建该控件，然后调用方法将添加该控件。To add a control that is not a control (in other words, a server control that will be wrapped with a control at run time), you should first call the method to create the control, and then call the method to add the control. 此方法的演示，请参阅示例部分。For a demonstration of this approach, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用方法以编程方式将服务器控件添加到页。The following code example demonstrates use of the method to add a server control programmatically to a page. 页面标记包含一个空``元素，和``元素。The page markup contains an empty `` element, and an `` element. 第一次**添加日历**单击按钮时，代码在事件处理程序创建控制，并将其添加到作为区域对象，调用方法。The first time the **Add Calendar** button is clicked, the code in the event handler creates a control, and adds it to a zone as a object, calling the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/CS/wpmgDeleteWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/VB/wpmgDeleteWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AuthorizeWebPart As WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler

summary.span: 当调用 方法以确定 或服务器控件是否能够添加到页中时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called to determine whether a or server control can be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件会发生控件添加到页。The event occurs whenever a control is being added to a page. 有大量的常见方案，可以在其中将控件添加到页。There are a number of common scenarios where a control can be added to a page. 有关这些的完整说明，请参阅备注部分方法。For a full description of these, see the Remarks section for the method. 时添加一个控件，它必须检查以查看是否其属性已设置并且，如果是这样，是否控件有权添加到页面。When a control is added, it must be checked to see whether its property has been set and, if so, whether the control is authorized to be added to the page. 开发人员可以创建事件处理程序事件，以提供筛选为控件。Developers can create event handlers for the event, to provide filtering for controls. 如果控件的属性值不符合事件处理程序代码中的条件，控件不会添加到页。If a control's property value does not meet the criteria in the event handler code, the control is not added to the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的自定义事件处理程序事件，会自动重写默认值方法。The following code example demonstrates how to set a custom event handler for the event, which automatically overrides the default method. 中的代码`mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart`方法检查页上的控件是否具有其各自属性值设置为`user`，并且如果是这样，则返回`true`，这意味着它们将被授权并添加到页面。The code in the `mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart` method checks whether the controls on the page have their respective property values set to `user` and, if so, returns `true`, which means that they will be authorized and added to the page. 这假定的默认方法是允许用户查看用户个性化设置作用域中的页的控件。This assumes the default approach is to allow users to view controls with a page in user personalization scope. 但请注意，在示例 1 中的控件都有其属性值设置为`admin`。Notice, however, that in the example one of the controls has its property value set to `admin`. 开发人员可能会将此筛选器放置在旨在用于只管理用户才能看到专用控件。Developers might place this filter on a specialized control that was designed for only administrative users to see. 此控件将会失败期间的授权检查事件，并将不会显示。This control will fail the authorization check during the event, and will not be displayed. 请注意，未将属性设置的控件的显示也;它们都被认为不是筛选方案的一部分，因为其未设置属性。Note that controls that do not have the property set are displayed as well; they are assumed not to be part of a filtering scenario because their properties are not set. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/CS/AuthorizeWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/VB/AuthorizeWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法存在，以便可以在不同的阶段，为开发人员提供更好地控制连接过程完成构成控件之间的连接的过程。The method exists so that the process of forming connections between controls can be done in distinct stages, giving developers more control over the connection process. 该方法执行初始检查以确保组`webPart`处于可以合法方式连接的状态。The method performs a set of initial checks to ensure that `webPart` is in a state where a connection can legitimately be formed. 如果`webPart`通过所有检查，然后将设置为当前所选控件 (请参阅属性)，并可以继续连接过程。If `webPart` passes all the checks, it is then set as the currently selected control (see the property), and the connecting process can continue.

para.span: 一种方法是将调用基方法，然后添加一些附加的自定义处理;或者，你可能想要完全自定义启动控件之间的连接的过程。

span.span: One approach would be to call the base method, and then add some additional custom handling; or you might want to completely customize the process of starting a connection between controls.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly BrowseDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode

summary.span: 表示包含 Web 部件控件的页的默认显示模式。

span.span: Represents the default display mode for pages that contain Web Parts controls.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段引用自定义对象，创建并包含控件。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 由于这是一个静态对象，你可以引用直接通过而无需控件的实例的类。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 包含 Web 部件页在首次加载时，在（浏览模式） 默认情况下。When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in (browse mode) by default. 当用户只需浏览与它们在正常的网页上时，在浏览模式中会保留页。When users are simply browsing as they would on a normal Web page, the page remains in browse mode. 如果用户想要对进行个性化设置的页面布局、 控件、 外观或行为，它们必须将页切换到一个专用的显示模式可通过属性。If users want to personalize a page's layout, controls, appearance, or behavior, they must switch the page into one of the specialized display modes available through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 此代码填充下拉列表的受支持的显示模式，在这种情况下是浏览和设计。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes, which in this case are browse and design. 请注意，，在`Page_PreRender`方法时，代码将检查是否当前属性设置为。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不是，`Label1`将隐藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrBrowseDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrBrowseDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，您拥有默认情况下浏览模式。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 请注意，该值指示在浏览模式中的页上的标签。Notice the label on the page that indicates you are in browse mode. 使用下拉列表框控件将页切换到设计模式。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode. 请注意，由于中的代码`Page_PreRender`方法，标签现在处于隐藏状态。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now hidden.

summary.span: 检查将参与连接的 控件，以确定它们是否能够被连接。

span.span: Checks the controls that will be participating in a connection to determine whether they are capable of being connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于确定是否两个控件可以连接。The method is used to determine whether two controls can be connected. 方法通常用作条件的检查，再调用方法。The method is typically used as a conditional check prior to calling the method. 方法检查的两个控件能够形成连接之前，必须满足的条件数。The method checks a number of criteria that must be met before two controls can form a connection. 以下列表总结了进行连接的主条件。The following list summarizes the primary criteria for making a connection. 如果满足这些条件 （加上一些附加内部条件），该方法返回`true`，这意味着这些控件可以连接：If all these criteria (plus some additional internal conditions) are met, the method returns `true`, meaning that the controls can be connected: - 提供程序和使用者控件不能为`null`，它们必须包含在所引用的控件的集合和属性。The provider and consumer controls cannot be `null`, and they must be contained in the collection of controls referenced by the property. - 提供程序和使用者不能为同一个控件。The provider and consumer cannot be the same control. 换而言之控件无法连接到其自身。In other words a control cannot connect to itself. - 对象 （连接点） 提供程序和使用者不能为`null`。The objects (connection points) for both the provider and consumer cannot be `null`. - 无法关闭的提供程序和使用者 (两个控件的属性可以是`true`)。The provider and consumer cannot be closed (neither control's property can be `true`). - 的连接点控件的属性必须与匹配的控件类型的使用者和提供程序。The property of the connection point control must match the type of the control of both consumer and provider. - 连接点必须同时启用 (其方法必须返回`true`)。The connection points must both be enabled (their methods must both return `true`). - 每个连接点没有必须尝试窗体中所指定在自己的更多连接属性。Each connection point must not be attempting to form more connections than what is specified in its own property. - 如果对象 (transformer) 是需要连接不兼容的控件，它不能是`null`。If a object (transformer) is required to connect incompatible controls, it cannot be `null`. 但是，如果控件已经兼容，则转换器必须为`null`。However, if the controls are already compatible, the transformer must be `null`. - 转换器 （如果使用） 必须引用在集合。The transformer (if used) must be referenced in the collection. - 转换器 （如果使用） 必须具有接口，以便它可以转换两个控件之间的数据提供程序和使用者与兼容。The transformer (if used) must have interfaces that are compatible with the provider and the consumer so that it can transform data between the two controls. 使用者和提供程序的辅助接口还必须是兼容的。The secondary interfaces of the consumer and provider must also be compatible.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CanConnectWebParts (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart provider, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint providerConnectionPoint, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart consumer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint consumerConnectionPoint);

.method public hidebysig instance bool CanConnectWebParts(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart provider, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint providerConnectionPoint, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart consumer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint consumerConnectionPoint) cil managed

public: bool CanConnectWebParts(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ provider, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::ProviderConnectionPoint ^ providerConnectionPoint, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ consumer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::ConsumerConnectionPoint ^ consumerConnectionPoint);

param.name: provider
param.span: 在控件连接时为 consumer 提供数据的控件。

span.span: The control that provides data to consumer when the controls are connected.

param.name: providerConnectionPoint
param.span: 使 provider 能够参与连接的 。

span.span: A that enables provider to participate in a connection.

param.name: consumer
param.span: 控件连接时从 provider 接收数据的控件。

span.span: The control that receives data from provider when the controls are connected.

param.name: consumerConnectionPoint
param.span: 一个 ，它作为回调方法，以便 consumer 可以参与连接。

span.span: A that acts as a callback method so that consumer can participate in a connection.

summary.span: 当使用者和提供者控件有兼容接口且不需要 对象时，请检查将参与连接的 控件，以确定它们是否能够被连接。

span.span: Checks the controls that will be participating in a connection to determine whether they are capable of being connected, when the consumer and provider controls have compatible interfaces and a object is not needed.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否能连接 和 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether and can be connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于连接`provider`和`consumer`如果这两个控件具有兼容的连接点类型，以便对象，则不需要。This method is used to connect `provider` and `consumer` when both controls have compatible connection point types, so that a object is not needed. 你可能想要使用此方法验证两个控件，可以连接，然后再调若要创建的编程连接。You might want to use this method to verify that two controls can be connected before calling to create a programmatic connection. 此重载使用相同的实现方法重载中，使用唯一的例外是，此重载不需要转换器。This overload uses the same implementation as the method overload, with the only exception being that this overload does not require a transformer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use this method. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含两个自定义网页可连接控件``元素，并创建连接使用某些事件处理代码方法。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, an `` element, and some event-handling code that creates a connection using the method. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 网页的声明性标记包含`Register`为用户控制和自定义控件的指令。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 没有``元素，``元素以包含自定义控件和``元素。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 请注意，在`Page_Load`方法，代码将检查是否连接可并且，如果是这样，定义一个提供程序、 一个使用者和它们各自的连接点，然后将新的连接添加到的一组静态连接引用的属性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks whether the connection can be made and, if so, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分是控件的源代码。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 它包含一个接口和两个自定义控件，其中一个充当一个提供程序，并将对方列为使用者。It contains an interface and two custom controls, one acting as a provider, and the other as a consumer. 因为它们具有兼容的连接点 (这两个识别`IZipCode`接口)，不需要转换器来建立连接。Because they have compatible connection points (both of them recognize the `IZipCode` interface), a transformer is not needed to make the connection. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 你已加载浏览器中的 Web 页后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**连接**切换页后，可以连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以启用你创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单中，，然后单击**连接**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 显示连接用户界面 (UI) 后，请注意，已由中包含的代码创建连接时`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于连接`provider`和`consumer`如果这两个控件具有不兼容的连接点类型，以便对象是必需的。This method is used to connect `provider` and `consumer` when both controls have incompatible connection point types, so that a object is required. 你可能想要使用此方法验证两个控件，可以连接，然后再调若要创建的编程连接。You might want to use this method to verify that two controls can be connected before calling to create a programmatic connection. 此重载使用相同的实现方法重载中，使用唯一的例外是，此重载所需的转换器。This overload uses the same implementation as the method overload, with the only exception being that this overload requires a transformer.

summary.span: 表示用于从控件目录向网页添加服务器控件的显示模式。

span.span: Represents the display mode used for adding server controls from a catalog of controls to a Web page.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段引用自定义对象，创建并包含控件。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 由于这是一个静态对象，你可以引用直接通过而无需控件的实例的类。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 如果用户想要将控件添加到页中，如果可用的服务器控件目录，则可以切换到页（目录模式），并显示目录用户界面 (UI)。When users want to add controls to a page, if a catalog of server controls is available, they can switch the page to (catalog mode), and the catalog user interface (UI) appears. 用于 Web 部件目录的用户界面提供的区域控件。The UI for a Web Parts catalog is provided by a zone control. 开发人员在设计时，将该区域添加到页，然后将服务器控件添加到该区域，以便用户将能够在运行时将这些控件添加到相应的页面。Developers add this zone to the page at design time, and then add server controls to the zone, so that users will be able to add those controls to their pages at run time. 开发人员已添加这些控件后，目录模式变得页上受支持的显示模式，因为所需的控件有若要启用目录的模式。After the developer has added these controls, catalog mode becomes a supported display mode on the page because the necessary controls are there to enable catalog mode. 当用户将某页目录模式、 区域和已添加到变得可见，它的所有服务器控件切换和用户可以从要添加到页中，或从页中删除控件的目录中选择控件。When a user switches a page to catalog mode, the zone and all the server controls that were added to it become visible, and the user can select controls from the catalog to add to the page, or remove controls from the page. 控件已添加到页后，会显示在普通浏览模式中，更新页。After the controls have been added to the page, they appear in normal browse mode and the page is updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 此代码填充页上，在这种情况下是浏览、 设计和目录的受支持的显示模式的下拉列表。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse, design, and catalog. 由于可以目录模式了``元素及其子元素在 Web 页。The catalog mode is available because of the `` element and its child elements in the Web page. 请注意，，在`Page_PreRender`方法时，代码将检查是否当前属性设置为。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不是，`Label1`将隐藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrCatalogDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrCatalogDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，您拥有默认情况下浏览模式。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 请注意，隐藏页上的标签。Notice that the label on the page is hidden. 使用下拉列表框控件将页切换到目录模式。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to catalog mode. 请注意，由于中的代码`Page_PreRender`方法，标签才现在可见。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible. 可以在目录中选择的控件，并将其添加到以下任一页上的两个区域。You can select the control in the catalog and add it to either of the two zones on the page.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个警告，用户关闭在连接中充当其他控件的提供者的控件时，会显示该警告。

span.span: Gets or sets a warning that is displayed when a user closes a control that is acting as a provider to other controls in a connection.

value.span: 一个包含警告消息的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the warning message.

value.span: 默认值是一条由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的消息。

span.span: The default is a culture-specific message supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户关闭控件，通常会显示任何消息。When a user closes a control, normally no message is displayed. 这意味着若要关闭控件有关的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about what it means to close a control, see the method. 但是，当控件连接到另一个控件，并充当提供程序的数据的另一个控件，当用户尝试关闭该控件时，将显示默认警告消息。However, when a control is connected to another control and is acting as a provider of data to the other control, a default warning message is displayed when a user attempts to close the control. 消息会通知用户，提供程序控制即将关闭，这意味着控制连接到此提供程序，如使用者不会使用任何数据。The message tells users that a provider control is about to close, which means that controls connected to this provider as consumers will no longer have any data to consume. 属性使开发人员能够自定义向用户显示警告消息。The property enables developers to customize the warning message that is displayed to the user. 当用户关闭，如果页开发人员将为空或 null 字符串值分配给此属性，将显示任何警告消息框是一个提供程序的控制。If a page developer assigns an empty or null string value to this property, no warning message box will be shown when a user closes a control that is a provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性向用户显示的自定义的警告。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a custom warning to users. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 包含两个自定义网页可连接控件和``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected and an `` element. - 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码包含示例的网页部分。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 你还需要自定义用户控件和上面提到的自定义控件的源代码。You will also need the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls mentioned above. 从示例部分获取这两项类概述。Obtain these two items from the Example section of the class overview. 以下 Web 页的代码演示如何将分配到自定义警告消息属性中的声明性标记中``元素。The following Web page code demonstrates how to assign a custom warning message to the property in declarative markup in the `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning/CS/webpartmanagerConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning/VB/webpartmanagerConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 你已加载浏览器中的 Web 页后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**连接**切换页后，可以连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以启用你创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单中，，然后单击**连接**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 显示连接用户界面 (UI) 后，单击**创建使用者连接**链接。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, click the **Create a connection to a Consumer** link. 单元格将显示包含一个下拉列表框控件。A cell appears that has a drop-down list control. 选择**天气控件**下拉列表中，然后单击**连接**来完成这两个控件的连接。Select **Weather Control** in the drop-down list, and click **Connect** to complete the connection of the two controls. 单击**关闭**，然后使用**显示模式**下拉列表来返回到正常浏览模式的页。Click **Close**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode. 最后，单击的谓词菜单**邮政编码**控件 （这是提供程序控制在此情况下），然后选择**关闭**。Finally, click the verbs menu for the **ZIP Code** control (which is the provider control in this case) and select **Close**. 自定义消息分配给属性显示。The custom message you assigned to the property is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CloseWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 正在 中关闭的 或服务器控件。

span.span: A or server control that is being closed in a .

summary.span: 以不在网页上呈现，但可以重新打开的方式关闭 控件。

span.span: Closes a control in such a way that it is not rendered on a Web page, but can be reopened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除或其他服务器控件，以使其不呈现最初包含它的 Web 页面上。The method removes a or other server control so that it is not rendered on the Web page that originally contained it. 已关闭的控件添加到对象，这将保持对已关闭的控件的引用，并使得要还原到页的控件。The closed control is added to a object, which maintains a reference to the closed control and makes it possible for the control to be restored to the page. 关闭控件仍显示在所引用的集合属性。A closed control still appears in the collection referenced by the property. 关闭控件是不同的删除它。Closing a control is different from deleting it. 已关闭的控件仍可用于还原到页中，但已删除的控件实例永久删除，而且将永远无法还原。Closed controls are still available to be restored to a page, but a deleted control instance is permanently removed and can never be restored. 而不管是否或服务器控件是 （在页面的标记中声明） 的静态或动态 （添加到页面以编程方式或通过用户从 Web 部件目录），它可以关闭并重新打开页面上。Regardless of whether a or server control is static (declared in the markup of a page) or dynamic (added to the page programmatically or by a user from a Web Parts catalog), it can be closed and reopened on a page. 通常情况下，用户可以关闭通过单击其谓词菜单并选择关闭谓词的控件。Typically, users can close a control by clicking its verbs menu and selecting the close verb. 也可以通过直接调用关闭控件方法并将其传递到的引用`webPart`。A control can also be closed by directly calling the method and passing it a reference to `webPart`. 在页面上其中控件已关闭，如果开发人员声明``元素，并在其中添加``元素，它提供了简单的用户界面 (UI) 的用户还原到页在运行时的已关闭的控件。On a page where controls have been closed, if a developer declares an `` element, and within it adds an `` element, it provides a simple user interface (UI) for users to restore closed controls to the page at run time. 用户可以将页切换到目录的显示模式，并且已关闭的控件将出现在该页目录。Users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and the closed controls will appear within the page catalog. 用户可以选择已关闭的控件并将其添加回第一页的任何位置，它们需要，以及然后将所选的控件的还原到页和按正常方式呈现。Users can select closed controls and add them back to the page at whatever position they desire, and then the selected controls are restored to the page and rendered as normal. 当方法被调用时，它会发出多个事件： ， （如果有多个控件），和（如果有连接的控件）。When the method is called, it raises several events: , (if there are multiple controls), and (if there are connected controls). 通常，开发人员可以取消这些事件，但在某些情况下它不能取消服务。Normally developers can cancel these events, but in certain cases it is not possible to cancel them. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档， ，和事件。For details, see the documentation for the , , and events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改页面显示模式。A user control that enables you to change page display modes. - 自定义控件。A custom control. - 网页。A Web page. - 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 下面的代码示例的第二部分是自定义控件。The second part of the code example is the custom control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此示例使用的动态编译方法;因此没有任何`Assembly`属性中`Register`指令对于此控件在 Web 页的顶部。This example uses the dynamic compilation approach; thus there is no `Assembly` attribute in the `Register` directive for this control at the top of the Web page. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 页包含区域，使用 <`asp:pagecatalogpart>`中声明的元素。The page contains a zone, with an <`asp:pagecatalogpart>` element declared within it. 这是将包含哪些内容的已关闭控制并使用户能够将其添加回页面。This is what will contain the closed control and enable users to add it back to the page. `Button1_Click`方法直接调用方法来关闭自定义控件，但用户还可关闭通过谓词菜单控件。The `Button1_Click` method directly calls the method to close the custom control, although a user can also close the control through the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart/CS/closeWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart/VB/closeWebPartVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，关闭自定义通过单击该控件的标头中的谓词菜单 （的箭头符号），然后单击控件**关闭**。After you load the page in a browser, close the custom control by clicking the verbs menu (the arrow symbol) in the header of the control, and clicking **Close**. 现在将页面更改为目录模式下通过选择**目录**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。Now change the page to catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 页目录将显示已关闭的控件。The page catalog appears with the closed control. 选择已关闭的控件旁边的复选框，单击**添加**以将其添加到页上，然后单击**关闭**来返回到浏览模式的页。Select the check box next to the closed control, click **Add** to add it to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 控件还原到页。The control is restored to the page. 现在关闭它同样，这次通过单击**关闭 web 部件**按钮。Now close it again, this time by clicking the **Close WebPart** button.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ConnectDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode

summary.span: 表示用于显示特殊用户界面 (UI) 以便用户管理 控件之间的连接的显示模式。

span.span: Represents the display mode used for displaying a special user interface (UI) for users to manage connections between controls.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段引用自定义对象，创建并包含控件。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 由于这是一个静态对象，你可以引用直接通过而无需控件的实例的类。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 当用户想管理之间的连接控件在网页上，如果区域已声明的页上，则可以切换到页模式。When users want to manage connections between controls on a Web page, if a zone has been declared on the page, they can switch the page into the mode. 连接的显示模式显示特殊 UI 管理连接，包括连接或断开连接控件，以及如何编辑现有连接的详细信息的功能。The connect display mode displays a special UI for managing connections, which includes the ability to connect or disconnect controls, and to edit the details of existing connections. 如果你想要为用户提供的功能使用由 Web 部件控件集提供的用户界面管理连接，您必须声明``页面的标记中的元素。If you want to provide users with the ability to manage connections with the UI provided by the Web Parts control set, you must declare an `` element in the markup of a page. 与其他类型的元素不同区域，不需要将此元素中的任何其他标记添加; 你只需声明元素本身。Unlike the elements for the other types of zones, you do not need to add any other tags within this element; you simply declare the element by itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用模式。The following code example demonstrates the usage of the mode. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 包含接口和自定义的源文件能够形成连接的控件。A source file that contains an interface and custom controls that can form a connection. - 提供一个连接用户界面并演示如何使用的 Web 页模式。A Web page that provides a connection UI and demonstrates working with the mode. - 如何运行该示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the example. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是包含一个接口和两个自定义的源文件的设计使它们可以连接的控件。The first part of the code example is a source file that contains an interface and two custom controls that are designed so they can be connected. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用的动态编译方法。This code example uses the dynamic compilation approach. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分是承载的自定义控件的网页。The second part of the example is a Web page that hosts the custom controls. 在服务器中`

summary.span: 获取对网页上所有当前连接的集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the collection of all current connections on a Web page.

span.span: A that contains a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供一种方法，若要访问的当前页上的连接。The property provides a way to access the current set of connections on a page. 集合本身是只读的且希望操作集合中的特定连接开发人员应使用等方法和。The collection itself is read-only, and developers who want to manipulate a specific connection from the collection should use methods such as and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the control. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含两个自定义网页可连接控件和``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码包含示例的网页部分。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 你还需要自定义用户控件和上面提到的自定义控件的源代码。You will also need the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls mentioned above. 从示例部分获取这两项类概述。Obtain these two items from the Example section of the class overview. 以下 Web 页的代码演示如何使用属性以编程方式获取页上的当前连接的计数。The following Web page code demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to get the count of current connections on a page. 请注意，在`

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ConnectionsActivated As EventHandler

summary.span: 在页上的所有当前 Web 部件连接不仅已经连接，而且已经开始在每个连接所涉及的使用者控件和提供者控件之间共享数据之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after all the current Web Parts connections on a page are not only connected, but have also begun actively sharing data between the consumer and provider controls involved in each connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生命周期的连接，此事件发生后页面完成其加载过程。In the life cycle of connections, this event occurs after a page completes its loading process. 它还后发生事件，只是指示或已成功连接所涉及的特定连接的服务器控件。It also occurs after the event, which indicates only that the or server controls involved in a specific connection have successfully connected. 在情况下在有多个连接在页中，方法指示在页面上的所有有效 Web 部件连接现活动和能够共享数据。In a case where there are multiple connections on a page, the method indicates that all the valid Web Parts connections on a page are now active and able to share data. 了解所有连接都处于活动状态后，开发人员可以执行任意数量的任务，包括将通知用户的所有连接的状态通知使用者控件处理和显示来自其提供程序，数据等等。Knowing that all connections are active, developers can carry out any number of tasks, including notifying users of the status of all the connections, notifying consumer controls to process and display data from their providers, and so on. 此事件与方法，它引发事件并允许开发人员创建自定义事件处理程序。This event is associated with the method, which raises the event and allows developers to create custom handlers for the event. 页开发人员可以创建自定义事件处理程序，通过添加`OnConnectionsActivated`属性设为``页上，，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivated` attribute to the `` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ConnectionsActivating As EventHandler

summary.span: 在激活网页上所有已建立的 Web 部件连接的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of activating all the established Web Parts connections on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生命周期的连接，会发生此事件页之前完成其加载进程，如调用方法。In the life cycle of connections, this event occurs as a page is completing its loading process, just before the method is called. 不同于事件，这就需要之间的特定连接或其他服务器控件。It is different from the event, which involves a particular connection between or other server controls. 事件发生时在页面上的所有可能的连接已连接，并且要激活。The event occurs when all the possible connections on a page have been connected and are about to be activated. 与关联事件方法，将引发事件。The event is associated with the method, which raises the event. 控件开发人员想要扩展的可以添加到页面的连接类型可以重写受保护方法并激活其他类型的连接。Control developers who want to extend the type of connections that can be added to a page could override the protected method and activate additional types of connections. 页开发人员可以创建自定义事件处理程序，通过添加`OnConnectionsActivating`属性设为``页上，，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivating` attribute to the `` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

summary.span: 在 区域中的两个 控件（或其他能建立连接的服务器控件）之间创建一个连接。

span.span: Creates a connection between two controls (or other server controls capable of forming connections) that reside in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法窗体的任何这两者之间的连接可以连接的控件。The method forms a connection between any two controls that can be connected. 在之前调用此方法来创建的连接，你可能还需要调用条件检查，以确保控件符合要求的形成连接中的方法。Before calling this method to create a connection, you might also want to call the method in a conditional check to ensure that the controls meet the requirements for forming a connection. > [!NOTE] > 还有可能不是两个服务器控件之间创建连接控件。It is also possible to create a connection between two server controls that are not controls. 一般情况下，必须在两个控件是自定义服务器控件 (例如，从继承的控件或现有的 ASP.NET 服务器控件)，以便你可以添加所需的成员。In general, the two controls would have to be custom server controls (for example, controls that inherit from or existing ASP.NET server controls) so that you could add the required members. 控件还必须满足下方指定要求。The controls would also have to meet the requirements specified below. 任何类型的两个控件之间的连接方案必须满足以下要求，以进行连接：Any type of connection scenario between two controls must meet the following requirements to be able to connect: - 每个控件位于（它不必是同一区域） 的区域。Each control resides in a zone (it does not have to be the same zone). - 在 Web 部件控件集中实现时，连接中的提供者控件实现一个接口作为用作回调到提供程序，并具有一个公共方法`ConnectionProvider`的方法，以标识为提供程序连接上的元数据属性点。As implemented in the Web Parts control set, the provider control in a connection implements an interface as a public method that serves as a callback to the provider, and has a `ConnectionProvider` metadata attribute on the method to identify it as a provider connection point. 因为方法检索提供程序连接点是虚方法，派生控件不一定具有要使用相同的元数据属性。Because the method that retrieves provider connection points is virtual, a derived control does not necessarily have to use the same metadata attribute. - 在 Web 部件控件集中实现时，在连接中，使用者控件还具有一种特殊的方法，使它能够获取对在提供程序的回调方法中，公开的接口的引用和使用者具有`ConnectionConsumer`上的元数据属性该方法以标识为使用者连接点。As implemented in the Web Parts control set, the consumer control in a connection also has a special method that enables it to get a reference to the interface that is exposed in the provider's callback method, and the consumer has a `ConnectionConsumer` metadata attribute on the method to identify it as a consumer connection point. 因为方法检索使用者连接点是虚方法，派生控件不一定具有要使用相同的元数据属性。Because the method that retrieves consumer connection points is virtual, a derived control does not necessarily have to use the same metadata attribute. - 回调方法必须是兼容的中 （这意味着使用者和提供程序可以共享数据直接） 提供程序的回调方法或开发人员, 提供的接口，使用者可以将它们的类型必须使用对象传递给将从提供程序的数据转换为使用者可以使用的窗体。The callback methods must either be compatible, in that the consumer can use the type of interface supplied in the provider's callback method (meaning that the consumer and provider can share data directly), or the developer must use a object to transform the data from the provider into a form that the consumer can use. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你不需要转换器时，则使用方法重载。When you do not need a transformer, use the method overload. 当需要转换器时，使用方法重载。When you need a transformer, use the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载用于在其连接点充分兼容确保它们而无需使用连接时连接控件对象。This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are sufficiently compatible that they can connect without using a object. 当调用该方法的此重载时，它只需将传递到另一重载版本的方法的调用并将传递`null`需要的参数对象。When this overload of the method is called, it simply passes the call to the other overloaded version of the method, and passes `null` for the parameter that requires a object. 当你尝试以编程方式连接两个控件时，你可以使用条件检查，以确定是否可以直接连接控件中的方法。When you attempt to connect two controls programmatically, you can use the method in a conditional check to determine whether the controls can be directly connected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法以编程方式创建的连接。The following code example demonstrates how to use this method to create a connection programmatically. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 从该示例中，你需要允许您更改在页上，显示模式的用户控件的源代码和源代码的两个自定义控件。From that example, you will need the source code for the user control that allows you to change display modes on the page, and the source code for the two custom controls. 承载这两个 Web 页的代码控制如下所示。The code for the Web page that hosts the two controls follows. 页使用`Register`顶部的指令以声明的用户控件和自定义控件。The page uses `Register` directives at the top to declare the user control and the custom controls. 然后以声明方式在引用的自定义控件``元素。The custom controls are then referenced declaratively within an `` element. 处理的代码`Button1_Click`方法创建使用控件之间的连接方法。The code that handles the `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls by using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，单击**连接 web 部件控件**按钮以形成连接。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to form the connection. 然后可以在文本框中，输入一些数据，并单击**输入 5 位邮政编码**按钮演示控件已连接，以及在第二个更新的第一个控件中输入该数据。You can then enter some data in the text box, and click the **Enter 5-digit ZIP Code** button to demonstrate that the controls are connected, and that data entered in the first control is updated in the second.

summary.span: 获取包含在网页的 区域中并由 控件管理的所有 、服务器或用户控件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of all , server, or user controls that are contained in zones on a Web page and are managed by the control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含由 控件管理的所有控件。

span.span: A that contains all controls managed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不引用所引用的其他控件控制，如各种区域控件，或控件和其他人。The property does not reference the other controls that are referenced by the control, such as the various zone controls, or controls, and others. Web 部件控件集，以及在不应在代码中调用的大多数开发情况下使用此属性。This property is used by the Web Parts control set, and in most development situations it is not intended to be called from your code. 出于此原因，虽然属性是公共的但会将其隐藏的 IntelliSense。For this reason, although the property is public, it is hidden from IntelliSense. 开发人员想要访问的集合或由其他服务器控件控件应使用其属性。Developers who want to access the collection of or other server controls managed by the control should use its property.

summary.span: 由 Web 部件控件集用来创建 或服务器控件的副本，以向网页中添加该控件。

span.span: Used by the Web Parts control set to create a copy of a or server control for the purpose of adding the control to a Web page.

returns.span: 要添加到页中的 。

span.span: A to be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能调用在代码中直接的方法。You cannot call the method directly from your code. 内部调用此方法控件添加新的动态的过程的一部分或到页上的服务器控件。This method is called internally by the control as part of the process of adding a new dynamic or server control to a page. 动态控件添加到页面以编程方式或通过 Web 部件用户界面 (UI)，例如用户从控件，而不是直接在页面的标记中声明一个静态控件的目录中添加控件。A dynamic control is added to a page programmatically or through the Web Parts user interface (UI), for example by a user adding a control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to a static control, which is declared directly in the markup of a page. > [!NOTE] > 如果开发人员想要使该方法以处理复制方案的更多控制，则可以在派生类中重写方法。The method can be overridden in a derived class if developers want to enable the method to handle additional control copying scenarios. 有关详细信息，请参阅对继承者部分的说明。For details, see the Notes to Inheritors section. 添加一个新的动态控件时，如果它是控件，方法返回的控件的新实例。When a new dynamic control is added, if it is a control, the method returns a new instance of the control. 如果正在添加的控件 （如用户控件、 一个自定义控件或 ASP.NET 控件） 的服务器控件的某些其他类型，已将具有与包装控件由 Web 部件控件集的对象。If the control being added is some other type of server control (such as a user control, a custom control, or an ASP.NET control), the control will already have been wrapped with a object by the Web Parts control set. 当方法遇到控件，它将返回的新实例控件中它包装的子控件的新实例。When the method encounters a control, it returns a new instance of the control with a new instance of the child control wrapped within it. 当方法创建要返回的控件的新副本，它还将重置所有属性的值为其默认值。When the method creates a new copy of a control to return, it also resets the values of all the properties to their default values. 请注意，是否你想要保留可个性化属性的值，并将它们复制到新的控件实例，应调用以及方法。Note that, if you want to preserve the values of the personalizable properties and have them copied to the new control instance, you should call the method as well. 由执行的最后一步方法是调用方法来获取控件的新 ID。The final step carried out by the method is to call the method to obtain a new ID for the control. > [!NOTE] > 此方法获取复制的控件的新 ID，因为你不应依赖于引用原始 id 添加到页面的动态控件Because the method obtains a new ID for a copied control, you should not rely on referencing a dynamic control that is added to a page by its original ID. 相反，应引用该方法返回的控件的新实例。Instead, you should reference the new instance of the control returned by the method.

para.span: 该方法声明为，以便开发人员无法从此继承类，请重写方法，并提供有关其他方案，它可以在其中创建控件的副本。

span.span: The method is declared as so that developers could inherit from the class, override the method, and provide for additional scenarios in which it could create copies of controls.

para.span: 例如，该方法无法 （可选） 作为输入接收已序列化到 XML 文件的控件。

span.span: For example, the method could optionally receive as input a control that has been serialized into an XML file.

para.span: 该方法无法反序列化 XML （如果存在），然后调用基方法来处理现有用例，并返回的新实例控件。

span.span: The method could deserialize the XML (if present), and then call the base method to handle the existing cases and to return a new instance of a control.

Protected Overridable Function CreateDisplayModes () As WebPartDisplayModeCollection

summary.span: 为 Web 部件应用程序创建由所有可能的显示模式组成的显示模式集。

span.span: Creates the set of all possible display modes for a Web Parts application.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含所有受支持的显示模式。

span.span: A that contains all the display modes that are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建的所有可能的显示模式，而不仅仅是支持特定页面上的显示模式的列表。This method creates the list of all possible display modes, not just the display modes supported on a particular page. 有关受支持的显示模式的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about the supported display modes, see the property. 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集创建下列一组用于在 Web 部件页上的显示模式：By default, the Web Parts control set creates the following set of display modes to be used on Web Parts pages: - - - - - 开发人员可以创建自定义显示模式，可以使用或不相关的自定义派生自的区域或类。Developers can create custom display modes, either with or without accompanying custom zones that derive from the or classes. 若要创建的自定义显示模式，你必须从类，也要添加为支持的模式，在页面上的显示模式，你必须从继承类并重写方法。To create a custom display mode, you must inherit from the class, and to add your display mode as a supported mode on a page, you must inherit from the class and override the method. 当使用添加显示模式方法，你应将其添加你希望它们出现在任何用户界面 (UI) 控件中的顺序 (如控件)，向用户提供可能的显示模式在页面上。When you add display modes by using the method, you should add them in the order that you want them to appear in any user interface (UI) controls (such as a control) that provide to users the possible display modes on a page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此代码示例包括五个部分：The code example has five parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载其他控件的网页。A Web page that hosts the other controls. - 用户控件，驻留在区域在网页上，并使您能够输入和显示在标签中的文本。A user control that resides in a zone on the Web page, and enables you to enter and display text in a label. - 包含两个控件的源代码文件。A source code file that contains two controls. 一个是一个自定义控件，以及其他是一个自定义要添加到页面的默认显示模式对象。One is a custom control, and the other is a custom object to add to the page's default display modes. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 该示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 它包含两个控制，用户控件和自定义控件。It contains two controls, both user controls, and the custom control. 请注意`Register`页顶部的指令以引用的用户控件和已编译的控件的命名空间。Notice the `Register` directives at the top of the page to reference the user controls and namespace for the compiled controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/createDisplayModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/createDisplayModeVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三个部分是用于输入和显示文本的用户控件。The third part of the example is the user control for entering and displaying text. 它使用控件创建的用户界面的多个视图。It uses a control to create multiple views of the UI. 一个视图显示与`Button1`按钮，另一个没有。One view appears with the `Button1` button, the other without. 请注意，在重写`OnPreRender`方法，代码检查以查看是否页目前处于的自定义显示模式，因此，如果是这样，显示用户控件，其中包括按钮的第一个视图。Notice that in the overridden `OnPreRender` method, the code checks to see whether the page is currently in the custom display mode and, if so, displays the first view of the user control, which includes the button. 如果该页是中的自定义显示模式，例如，如果页是在浏览或设计模式下，不会隐藏按钮。If the page is not in the custom display mode, for example if the page is in browse or design mode, the button is hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/TextDisplaycs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/TextDisplayvb.ascx#2)] 该示例的第四个部分是两个自定义类的源文件。The fourth part of the example is the source file for the two custom classes. 请注意，自定义类重写方法，并且它首先调用基方法，以添加所有默认显示模式，然后添加自定义显示模式。Notice that the custom class overrides the method, and that it first calls the base method to add all the default display modes, and then adds the custom display mode. 自定义显示模式类， `InLineEditDisplayMode`，只需继承自、 构造函数中，在设置的显示模式的名称和重写基属性以建立自定义显示的特征数。The custom display mode class, `InLineEditDisplayMode`, simply inherits from , sets the name of the display mode in the constructor, and overrides a number of the base properties to establish the characteristics of the custom display. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)] 若要运行的代码示例，加载浏览器中的页。To run the code example, load the page in a browser. 请注意，该页是当前处于浏览模式，并且没有按钮是可见的。Notice that the page is currently in browse mode, and no button is visible. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件中，更改到页**内联编辑显示**模式，并请注意现在`Button1`按钮是在较低的用户控件中可见。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to **Inline Edit Display** mode, and notice that now the `Button1` button is visible in the lower user control. 添加一些文本，然后单击按钮来更新控件。Add some text, and click the button to update the control. 请注意，页面显示返回到浏览模式，并现在显示您输入的文本，而按钮再次处于隐藏状态，因为页不再的自定义显示模式。Notice that the page display is returned to browse mode, the text you entered is now displayed, and the button is once again hidden because the page is no longer in the custom display mode.

summary.span: 获取一个唯一值，用于充当动态连接的 ID。

span.span: Gets a unique value to serve as an ID for a dynamic connection.

returns.span: 一个包含连接的唯一 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains a unique ID for a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法生成的 GUID 值，并将其转换为字符串，以便作为连接的唯一 ID。The method generates a GUID value and converts it to a string to serve as the unique ID for a connection. 此方法叫做每次创建动态连接。The method is called each time a dynamic connection is created.

para.span: 开发人员可以重写此方法在派生类更改的实现以生成唯一 id。

span.span: Developers can override this method in a derived class to change the implementation for generating a unique ID.

span.span: Generates a unique ID for a dynamic control.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含控件的唯一 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the unique ID for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件添加到网页，则它们可以是静态 （这意味着页标记中声明的控件） 或动态 （这意味着它们将以编程方式添加）。When controls are added to a Web page, they can be static (which means the control is declared in the page markup) or dynamic (which means they are added programmatically). 在任何方案中其中控件创建新的动态控件将添加到页上，它会调用此方法以生成唯一 id。In any scenario where the control is creating new dynamic controls to add to the page, it calls this method to generate a unique ID. 方法是虚方法，使开发人员可以重写它如果他们想要提供自定义实现来生成 id。The method is virtual so that developers can override it if they want to provide a custom implementation for generating the ID.
