summary.span: 执行确定控件是否已经过授权可添加至页的最后步骤。

span.span: Carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，指示控件是否已经过授权可添加至页中。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载方法确定控件是否有权添加到页面中的最后步骤执行。The overload method carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 该方法确保`type`是有效的类型，而`path`被检查的控件是一个用户控件的情况下，才会包含一个值。The method ensures that `type` is a valid type, and that `path` has a value only if the control being checked is a user control. 然后，它调用的重要方法，将引发事件。Then it calls the critical method, which raises the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来确定控件是否有权添加到页。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to determine whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 第一步是创建的筛选器可能排除控件。The first step is to create a filter that can potentially exclude a control. 以下 Web 页包含三个 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的``元素。The following Web page contains three ASP.NET server controls in an `` element. 请注意，第一个和第二个控件具有其属性设置为不同的值，并且第三个不会分配属性。Notice that the first and second controls have their properties set to different values, and the third does not assign the property. 可以在运行时，检查此授权值和控件可以添加到页面，如果在筛选器匹配由开发人员设置的条件。This authorization value can be checked at run time, and the control can be added to the page if the filter matches criteria set by the developer. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 第二步是重写方法，并创建自定义授权筛选器处理。The second step is to override the method, and create custom handling for authorization filters. 请注意，代码首先检查属性是否具有一个值，以便任何控件，不会分配属性将自动添加。Note that the code first checks whether the property has a value, so that any control that does not assign the property will be added automatically. 如果控件具有筛选器，代码会返回该`true`仅当筛选器值等于`admin`。If a control has a filter, the code returns `true` only if the filter value is equal to `admin`. 此示例演示一个简单的机制，可用于向特定用户，具体取决于其角色显示某些控件。This demonstrates a simple mechanism you can use for displaying certain controls to certain users, depending on their role. 尽管超出本主题的范围了使用角色的完整示例，您可以使用相同的逻辑作为在此代码示例中，重写的方法，只不过无法检查当前用户是否属于与授权筛选器值匹配的角色然后将仅针对该用户控件添加。While a full example using roles is beyond the scope of this topic, you could use the same logic as the overridden method in this code example, except that you could check whether the current user is in a role that matches the authorization filter value, and then add the control only for that user. 这将使您创建其中某些用户将看到所有控件和其他用户将只能都看到所选的控件的页面。This would enable you to create pages where some users would see all the controls, and other users would see only selected controls. 这是如果你使用角色的可能外观检查筛选器的逻辑：This is how the logic that checks the filter might look if you used roles: ```vb If Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, authorizationFilter) Then return True Else return False End If ``` ```csharp if(Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, authorizationFilter)) return true; else return false; ``` 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用的动态编译方法。This code example uses the dynamic compile method. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 加载浏览器中后，请注意，将显示第一个控件，这是由于它匹配重写方法中的条件。After you load the page in a browser, note that the first control is displayed, because it matches the criteria in the overridden method. 第二个控件未添加到页上，因为其筛选器值被排除。The second control is not added to the page, because its filter value is excluded. 添加了第三个控件，因为它不具有其属性集。The third control is added, because it does not have its property set. 如果你更改在第二个控件，并将检索与匹配的第一个控件，然后再次运行此页上的属性值，以及添加第二个控件。If you change the property value on the second control to match that of the first control, and then run the page again, the second control is added as well.

para.span: 可以重写此方法通过继承类，如果你想要检查授权时提供附加的处理。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用属性内部来跟踪是否有任何它所管理的页面级别个性化数据已更改。The control uses the property internally to track whether any of the page-level personalization data that it manages has changed. 当用户执行各种级别的页，如添加或删除的个性化设置操作时，将更改个性化数据控件，连接或断开控件，通过移动控件和其他操作更改页面的布局。The personalization data changes when users carry out various personalization actions at the page level, such as adding or removing controls, connecting or disconnecting controls, changing the page's layout by moving controls, and other actions. > [!NOTE] > 用户还可以执行级别的控制，这意味着它们对特定的控件进行个性化修改，个性化和所做的更改仅影响该控件。Users can also perform personalization at the control level, which means that they make personalization changes to a specific control, and the changes affect only that control. 示例将编辑控件，并可以更改其标题文本或它的背景色。An example would be editing the control and changing its title text, or its background color. 控件级别个性化设置不会影响所跟踪的页面级别个性化数据控件，因此属性值不会更改为`true`控件级别个性化发生时。Control-level personalization does not affect the page-level personalization data tracked by the control, and so the property value is not changed to `true` when control-level personalization occurs. 尽管该方法受保护并不直接由调用方，访问直接由调用方，然后才能访问属性，并返回此属性的值。Although the method is protected and cannot be accessed directly by a caller, the property can be accessed directly by callers, and it returns the value of this property.

summary.span: 将 或服务器控件从一个 区域移动到另一个区域，或移动到相同区域中的新位置。

span.span: Moves a or server control from one zone to another, or to a new position within the same zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用方法来移动`webPart`到在同一区域中，或不同区域中的新位置。The control uses the method to move `webPart` to a new location in the same zone, or in a different zone. 你可以直接从代码中，调用此方法，也会调用时用户将控件移到新位置在 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 中使用各种选项。You can call this method directly from code, and it is also invoked when a user moves a control to a new position using various options in the Web Parts user interface (UI). 之前，必须满足的条件数`webPart`可以移动，和其中的大部分由本主题的异常部分中列出的项。A number of conditions must be met before `webPart` can be moved, and most of these are indicated by items listed in the Exceptions section of this topic. 如果`webPart`中未包含区域开始时，不能移入某个区域。If `webPart` was not contained in a zone to begin with, it cannot be moved into a zone. 在满足的条件后，操作按以下顺序发生移动`webPart`:After the conditions have been met, the following sequence of actions occurs to move `webPart`: 1. 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 2. `webPart` 从其当前区域 （如有必要），删除和添加到其新的区域或在其当前的区域内的新位置。`webPart` is removed from its current zone (if necessary), and added to its new zone or new position within its current zone. 3. 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 4. `zoneIndex`的每个起点和目标区域中的控件重置，以反映移动的控件。The `zoneIndex` of every control in both the origin and destination zones is reset to reflect the moved control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法直接从代码以移动到另一个控件从一个区域。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method directly from code to move a control from one zone to another. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 用于更改显示模式用户控件。A user control for changing display modes. - 承载控件网页。A Web page to host the controls. - 如何运行的代码示例说明。An explanation of how to run the code example. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 该示例的第二部分是一个网页，其中包含两个区域，其中每个包含两个服务器控件。The second part of the example is a Web page that contains two zones, each of which contains two server controls. 当用户单击**移动 web 部件**在页上中的代码的按钮`Button1_Click`方法将第一个区域中控件移动到第二个区域中的新位置。When a user clicks the **Move WebPart** button on the page, the code in the `Button1_Click` method moves a control from the first zone to a new position in the second zone. 请注意，代码必须先调用方法来检索包装对象`list1`控件。Notice that the code first must call the method to retrieve the object that wraps the `list1` control. 这是必需的因为的第一个参数方法需要控件，而`list1`是 ASP.NET 服务器控件。This is required because the first parameter of the method requires a control, whereas `list1` is an ASP.NET server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart/CS/MoveWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart/VB/MoveWebPartVB.aspx#1)] 在页面加载后，单击**移动 web 部件**按钮，并请注意，包含链接的控件将移到第二个区域中的中间位置。After the page loads, click the **Move WebPart** button, and note that the control that contains the links moves into the middle position in the second zone. 通过调用以编程方式完成这种控件移动方法。This movement of the control is accomplished programmatically by calling the method. 你还可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页切换到设计模式，并在设计模式下，你可以将控件拖到不同区域或它们各自区域中的不同位置。You can also use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode, and in design mode, you can drag the controls to different zones or different positions within their zones. 方法也由调用控件以处理此类用户启动移动。The method is also called by the control to handle such user-initiated moves.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAuthorizeWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnAuthorizeWebPart (e As WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 。

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件并调用该事件的处理程序（如果存在）。

span.span: Raises the event and invokes a handler for the event, if one exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用方法，当控件要添加到页面的授权检查。The method is called by the method, when a control is being checked for authorization to be added to a page. 当方法调用，因此，它会发出事件，并且如果没有为事件处理程序方法，它调用处理程序。When the method is called, it raises the event, and if there is a handler method for the event, it invokes the handler. 授权的过程控件是一个重要的 Web 部件功能。The process of authorizing controls is an important Web Parts feature. 每个或添加到的区域的服务器控件控件将经历授权过程以确定是否可以添加控件。Every or server control that is added to a zone by the control goes through an authorization process to determine whether the control can be added. 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集不提供任何筛选条件，以防止控件添加到区域。By default, the Web Parts control set does not provide any filtering criteria to prevent controls from being added to a zone. 但控件集提供了开发人员创建其自己的筛选条件所需的机制。But the control set does provide the mechanisms necessary for developers to create their own filtering criteria. 通过使用这些机制，可以创建自定义筛选方案。By using these mechanisms, you can create custom filtering scenarios. 例如，你可以创建筛选器，以便如果用户是管理员角色中，某些控件将添加到区域中，当呈现页面，并且如果用户是用户角色中，将不会添加这些控件。For example, you could create a filter so that, if a user is in an administrator role, certain controls would be added to a zone when the page is rendered, and if the user is in a user role, those controls would not be added. 在授权过程中筛选控件使用机制属性控件，和方法，与上的事件控件。The mechanisms for filtering controls during the authorization process are the property on controls, the and methods, and the event on the control. 若要创建筛选的方案，没有实质上是两个任务。To create a filtering scenario, there are essentially two tasks. 首先，你还将字符串转换为分配每个属性你想要筛选的控件。First, you assign strings to the property of each control you want to filter. 这些字符串值可以是任意的但它们应包含你想要作为筛选依据的条件。These string values can be arbitrary, but they should contain the criteria you want to filter on. 例如，如果你想给定的控件要添加到区域才管理员用户正在查看页上，则可以分配的字符串值`admin`的属性。For example, if you wanted a given control to be added to a zone only if an administrator user is viewing the page, then you might assign a string value of `admin` to the property. 然后可以使用 ASP.NET 角色功能，并将你的站点的所有用户都添加到各种角色，例如管理员、 经理和用户。Then you could use the ASP.NET roles feature, and add all users of your site to various roles such as administrator, manager, and user. 当正在加载页面时，筛选代码将检查用户的哪些角色中，将其与要检查的控件上的授权筛选器值比较，如果该用户的管理员角色的是 （例如），并且你已设置的控件的值`admin`，无法添加控件。When a page is loading, your filtering code would check what role a user is in, compare it to the authorization filter value on a control being checked, and if (for example) the user is in an administrator role and you had set the control's value to `admin`, the control could be added. 创建筛选方案的第二步是编写代码以检查属性值在控件，并确定每个控件是否已被添加到其区域之前的授权。The second step in creating a filtering scenario is to write code to check the property values on controls, and determine whether each control is authorized before it is added to its zone. 有两个用于此筛选代码的放置位置选项。There are two options for where to place this filtering code. 第一个选项是页开发人员的首选的选项。The first option is the preferred option for page developers. 你可以创建一个方法来处理直接在 Web 页的服务器脚本代码，或单独的代码文件中的事件。You can create a method to handle the event directly in the Web page server script code, or in a code separation file. 将你的方法与事件相关联通过添加`OnAuthorizeWebPart`属性设为的标记控制在页中，如下面的示例标记代码中所示。Associate your method with the event by adding the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute to the tag for the control in the page, as shown in the following sample markup code. ``` ``` 所有自定义方法都只需是检查每个控制是否满足筛选条件，然后，根据结果，将分配到一个布尔值属性对象，以指示是否控件均可以是添加。All your custom method has to do is check each control for the filtering criteria and then, based on the results, assign a Boolean value to the property of the object to indicate whether the control can be added. 示例部分中的代码演示如何执行此操作。The code in the Example section demonstrates how to do this. 有关在何处放置筛选代码的第二个选项是继承自类，并重写一个方法以检查筛选器条件。The second option for where to place your filtering code is to inherit from the class, and override a method to check the filter criteria. 可以重写以执行此操作的两个方法方法或方法。The two methods you can override to do this are the method or the method. 尽管任何一种方法将起作用，但在大多数情况下它是更可取的方法重写方法，因为它提供了更多的编程控制对整个授权过程中，而方法执行只有一项特定任务这是引发的事件和处理程序提出的检查。Although either method would work, in most cases it is preferable to override the method, because it provides you with greater programmatic control over the whole authorization process, whereas the method does only one specific task, which is to raise the event and check for a handler. 有关自定义的代码示例类，并重写方法，请参阅的方法重载。For a code example of a custom class that overrides the method, see the overload of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的自定义事件处理程序事件，从而使处理程序可以提供自定义筛选代码方法。The following code example demonstrates how to set a custom event handler for the event, so that the handler can provide custom filtering code for the method. 此示例将页开发人员提供筛选的方案和授权的典型方式控件添加到页。This example would be a typical way for a page developer to provide a filtering scenario and authorization of controls to be added to a page. 在 Web 页中，请注意，``元素具有`OnAuthorizeWebPart`具有分配给它的事件处理程序名称属性。In the Web page, notice that the `` element has the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute with the name of the event handler assigned to it. 该方法检查页上的控件是否具有其各自属性值设置为`admin`，并且如果是这样，则返回`true`，这意味着它们将被授权并添加到页面。The method checks whether the controls on the page have their respective property values set to `admin` and, if so, returns `true`, which means that they will be authorized and added to the page. > [!NOTE] > 请注意，控件不具有任何值分配给属性还将添加，因为它们都被认为不是筛选方案的一部分。Note that controls that do not have any value assigned to the property are added as well, because they are assumed not to be part of a filtering scenario. 此操作可能是筛选方案中常用的方法： 将筛选某些控件，并且其他人不会因为其假定为可供所有用户。This would be a common approach in a filtering scenario: some controls would be filtered, and others would not be, because they are presumed to be available for all users. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/CS/AuthorizeWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/VB/AuthorizeWebPartVB.aspx#1)] 设置角色中的用户不在本主题的范围，因为此代码示例将不会检查中筛选的用户角色。Because setting up users in roles is beyond the scope of this topic, this code example does not check user roles in the filtering. 但是，筛选控件根据用户角色的方案是，可能需要此筛选功能的最常见用途之一。However, the scenario of filtering controls according to user roles is likely to be one of the most common uses of this filtering feature. 如果角色对你的站点，并且你想要检查此方法以筛选控件中的用户角色，该方法类似于下面的代码块 （而不是在前面的代码示例不使用角色更简单的方法）。If you have roles on your site, and you want to check user roles in this method to filter controls, the method would resemble the following code block (versus the simpler approach in the preceding code example, which does not use roles). ```vb Protected Sub WebPartManager1_AuthorizeWebPart(ByVal sender _ As Object, ByVal e As WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs) If String.IsNullOrEmpty(e.AuthorizationFilter) Then If Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, _ e.AuthorizationFilter) Then e.IsAuthorized = True Else e.IsAuthorized = False End If End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart(object sender, WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs e) { if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(e.AuthorizationFilter)) { if(Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, e.authorizationFilter)) e.IsAuthorized = true; else e.IsAuthorized = false; } } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发页面完成加载过程后的事件。The method raises the event after a page has completed the loading process. 该方法提供了一种添加事件的处理程序方法。The method provides a way to add a handler for the event. 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnConnectionsActivated`属性设为``页，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnConnectionsActivated` attribute to the `` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

span.span: Developers can override the method in a derived class.

span.span: Raises the event to indicate that a page and its controls have loaded, and the process of activating connections can begin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发事件，开发人员提供一种机制，用于以编程方式自定义激活连接的过程。The method raises the event, which provides developers with a mechanism for programmatically customizing the process of activating connections. 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnConnectionsActivating`属性设为``页，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnConnectionsActivating` attribute to the `` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

para.span: 开发人员可以重写方法在派生类。

span.span: Developers can override the method in a derived class.

Protected Overridable Sub OnDisplayModeChanged (e As WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，包含与更改后的显示模式相关联的事件数据。

span.span: A that contains event data associated with a changed display mode.

summary.span: 引发 事件，以指示 控件在网页上已完成从一种显示模式切换到另一种显示模式的过程。

span.span: Raises the event to indicate that the control has completed the process of switching from one display mode to another on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其基类中的方法形成只引发事件。The method in its base form simply raises the event.

para.span: 您可以重写方法。

span.span: You can override the method.

para.span: 例如，在更改之后的显示模式，你可能想要更改中的用户界面 (UI)，具体取决于哪些显示模式中包含的外观的某些内容属性。

span.span: For example, after a change of display mode, you might want to change something in the appearance of the user interface (UI), depending on which display mode is contained in the property.

para.span: 或者，你可能想要隐藏某些内容，或显示某个控件。

span.span: Or you might want to hide certain content, or display a certain control.

para.span: 当你重写方法时，你应通常调用基方法重写的方法的最后一步骤，以便自定义代码先运行，并且上一次，引发该事件，该值指示模式更改为完整。

span.span: When you override the method, you should normally call the base method as the last step of the overridden method, so that your custom code runs first, and the event is raised last, indicating that the mode change is complete.

summary.span: 引发 事件，以指示 控件在网页上正处于从一种显示模式切换到另一种显示模式的过程中。

span.span: Raises the event to indicate that the control is in the process of switching from one display mode to another on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其基类中的方法形成只引发事件。The method in its base form simply raises the event.

para.span: 您可以重写方法。

span.span: You can override the method.

para.span: 例如，当正在更改时的显示模式，你可能想要检查将哪些的新显示模式 (通过使用属性) 和更改新的显示模式将基于的用户界面 (UI) 中的某些内容。

span.span: For example, as a display mode is changing, you might want to check what the new display mode will be (by using the property) and change something in the user interface (UI) based on what the new display mode will be.

para.span: 如果你的自定义显示模式，你可能想要使某些控件在自定义模式即将成为新的显示模式的情况下可见。

span.span: If you had a custom display mode, you might want to make certain controls visible if the custom mode is going to be the new display mode.

para.span: 当你重写此方法时，你应通常调用基方法重写的方法的第一步以便引发事件以指示正在启动的显示模式更改。

span.span: When you override this method, you should normally call the base method as the first step of the overridden method, so that the event is raised to indicate a display mode is starting to change.

para.span: 然后，自定义代码可以更改在用户界面 (UI) 之前实际显示新的显示模式。

span.span: Then, your custom code can make changes in the user interface (UI) before the new display mode is actually displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSelectedWebPartChanged(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnSelectedWebPartChanged (e As WebPartEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 。

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件，该事件在新选择了某个 控件或清除对它的选择之后发生。

span.span: Raises the event, which occurs after a control has either been newly selected or had its selection cleared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发事件，这通常是在开发人员可能希望更改用户界面 (UI) 的外观的时间点。The method raises the event, which is typically a point in time where a developer might want to change the appearance of the user interface (UI). 例如，当新控件被选定，Web 部件控件集更改新选择的控件的呈现。For example, when a new control is selected, the Web Parts control set changes the rendering of the newly selected control. 清除控件的选择之后，呈现返回到正常。After a control's selection is cleared, the rendering is returned to normal. 在用户选择特定控件以供编辑，调用方法。After a user selects a particular control for editing, the method is called. 当用户完成编辑控件，并将其关闭，清除了控件的选择，结果再次调用方法。When the user finishes editing the control and closes it, with the result that the control's selection is cleared, the method is called again.

para.span: 有几个选项与相关事件，可以使开发人员自定义更改所选的控件后发生的呈现。

span.span: There are several options related to the event, to allow developers to customize the rendering that occurs after the selected control has changed.

para.span: 在声明性代码中，在元素无法设置属性，并为其分配自定义方法的名称。

span.span: In declarative code, within the element you could set the attribute, and assign to it the name of a custom method.

para.span: 在事件发生时，在自定义的方法中，你可以修改所选控件的呈现。

span.span: In the custom method, you could modify the rendering of the selected controls when the event occurs.

para.span: 另一个选项是继承自类并重写此方法。

span.span: Another option is to inherit from the class and override the method.

para.span: 第三个选项是自定义在区域级别; 呈现例如，你可以从继承类，并重写其方法，以自定义控件选中和清除编辑过程的呈现。

span.span: A third option is to customize the rendering at the zone level; for example, you can inherit from the class, and override its method, to customize the rendering of controls selected and cleared during the editing process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发事件，更改其中的过程中发生当前选中控件。The method raises the event, which occurs during the process of changing which control is currently selected. 控件使用此方法，而且关联的事件，以提供取消进程在其中更改所选的控件的机会。The control uses this method, and the associated event, to provide an opportunity to cancel a process in which the selected control is changing. 例如，在调用该方法方法，并还在方法，以提供一种方法来取消该过程。For example, the method is called within the method, and also within the method, to provide a way to cancel the process. 如果用户单击正在编辑的控件上的取消谓词，该控件不再处于选中状态和未保存编辑的任何更改，因为方法使它能够取消编辑的更改。If a user clicks the cancel verb on a control that is being edited, the control is no longer selected and any editing changes are not saved, because the method makes it possible to cancel the editing changes. > [!NOTE] > 期间的开始和结束连接的过程的方法同样调用方法到另一个控件，以便取消该进程的控件。The method is similarly called during the methods that begin and end the process of connecting a control to another control, to enable canceling that process. 页开发人员可以创建自定义处理程序通过添加事件`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`属性设为``中声明性页面标记，并将自定义方法的名称分配给该属性的元素。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute to the `` element in declarative page markup, and assigning to the attribute the name of a custom method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发事件，则指示已在页面上已成功关闭控件 （或其他服务器或用户控件）。The method raises the event to indicate that a control (or other server or user control) has been successfully closed on a page. 若要关闭控件意味着若要删除从页以便不呈现，并且还将其放在一个特殊持有对象调用页目录。To close a control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog. 对应于一个页目录控制，维护对已关闭的引用为每个页的控件。A page catalog, which corresponds to the control, maintains references to closed controls for each page. 如果控件声明内的网页区域，用户可以将页切换到目录的显示模式，并将以前关闭任何控件添加回页面。If a control is declared on a page within a zone, users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add back to the page any controls that were previously closed. 方法使开发人员创建的自定义处理程序有机会事件。The method provides an opportunity for developers to create a custom handler for the event. 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartClosed`属性设为``页，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 开发人员可能在此方法中执行的一个有用的任务是显示在已关闭的控件的位置的占位符，完成与工具提示将告知用户如何将控件添加回页面。One useful task a developer might carry out in this method is to display a placeholder in place of the closed control, complete with a ToolTip that would inform users how to add the control back to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅动态控件可以被删除，并且当删除控件时，控件实例从页面中永久删除，无法还原。Only dynamic controls can be deleted, and when a control is deleted, the control instance is permanently removed from a page and cannot be restored. 动态控件是指那些以编程方式，添加或从 Web 部件目录，而不是静态控件中声明的网页上的标记。Dynamic controls are those that are added programmatically, or from a Web Parts catalog, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page. 方法引发事件来指示，从其区域永久删除控件。The method raises the event to indicate that a control is being permanently deleted from its zone. 该方法还提供了机会取消删除过程。The method also provides the opportunity to cancel the deleting process. 如果控件已成功删除从页中，事件遵循。If the control is successfully deleted from the page, the event follows. 页开发人员可以通过添加为关联的事件提供自定义的处理程序`OnWebPartDeleting`属性设为``上 Web 页面中，，然后将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性的元素。Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发事件在最后的方法，可确保移动控件的过程完成之前的任何代码在事件处理程序将运行。The method raises the event at the very end of the method, which ensures that the process of moving a control is complete before any code in the event handler runs. 在其当前的区域内或另一个区域，在移动控件和是否移动是以编程方式或通过用户拖动控件并不重要时引发事件。The event is raised when a control is moved within its current zone, or to another zone, and it does not matter whether the movement is done programmatically or by a user dragging the control. 页开发人员可以创建自定义处理程序通过添加事件`OnWebPartMoved`属性设为 <`asp:webpartmanager>`元素，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartMoved` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

span.span: Raises the event, which occurs after a connection has been established between controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将引发其对应的事件在最后的方法，这样可以确保事件处理程序中的任何代码运行之前完成连接两个控件所必需的步骤。The method raises its corresponding event at the very end of the method, which ensures that the steps necessary to connect two controls are completed before any code in the event handler runs. 该方法提供了对创建连接的过程进行编程控制和关联的事件是在该处若要更新的用户界面 (UI) 或通知用户已建立的连接的方便的点。The method provides programmatic control over the process of creating connections, and the associated event is a convenient point at which to update the user interface (UI) or notify a user that a connection has been established. 页开发人员可以创建自定义处理程序通过添加事件`OnWebPartsConnected`属性设为 <`asp:webpartmanager>`元素，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Personalization As WebPartPersonalization

summary.span: 获取对包含网页个性化设置数据的对象的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to an object that contains personalization data for a Web page.

value.span: 包含个性化设置数据的 。

span.span: A that contains personalization data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够访问与通过页关联的对象控件。The property provides a way to access the object that is associated with a page through the control. 使用此属性，可访问的个性化设置对象的各种成员。Using this property, you can access the various members of the personalization object. 例如，你可以使用方法切换页面的个性化设置范围从共享到用户作用域，反之亦然。For example, you can use the method to switch the page's personalization scope from shared to user scope, or vice versa. 你还可找到出当前的个性化设置范围的页上，是否启用了个性化设置甚至在页上的提供程序用于个性化数据时，和的详细信息。You can also find out the current personalization scope of the page, whether personalization is even enabled on the page, which provider is being used for the personalization data, and more. 请注意，数据引用的属性是仅将跟踪的页面级别个性化数据控件。Note that the data referenced by the property is only the page-level personalization data that is tracked by the control. 特定于控件的个性化数据，如可个性化设置的属性的值控制，不是属于属性。Control-specific personalization data, such as the values of personalizable properties on controls, is not part of the property. > [!NOTE] > Web 部件个性化设置的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information on Web Parts personalization, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically. 以下网页上，用户可以进入编辑模式，若要编辑的某些方面控件。The following Web page allows a user to enter edit mode to edit certain aspects of the control. **切换范围**按钮页切换到用户或共享个性化设置作用域。The **Toggle Scope** button switches the page to user or shared personalization scope. **编辑模式**和**浏览模式**按钮每个页切换到适当的显示模式。The **Edit Mode** and **Browse Mode** buttons each switch the page into the appropriate display mode. 请注意，在`

summary.span: 保存由 控件维护的自定义个性化设置状态数据，以便重新加载该页时可以重新加载此数据。

span.span: Saves custom personalization state data maintained by the control, so that this data can be reloaded whenever the page is reloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法过程至关重要个性化设置，因为它允许个性化的用户设置，以供将来的浏览器会话存储并访问到页。The method is critical in the process of personalization, because it enables personalized user settings to be stored for future browser sessions and visits to a page. 该方法保存自定义个性化设置状态数据，其中包括以下各项： 动态或已添加到页或从一个页; 已移页; 的控件，并且具有的动态连接中删除的服务器控件已创建或删除。The method saves custom personalization state data, which includes items such as the following: dynamic or server controls that have been added to a page or deleted from a page; controls that have been moved on a page; and dynamic connections that have been created or deleted. 不能在代码中直接调用此方法。You cannot call this method directly from your code. 但是，可以调用方法，其自身调用此方法以保存个性化数据。You can, however, call the method, which itself calls this method to save personalization data.

para.span: 开发人员可以重写此方法在派生类自定义保存个性化数据的过程。

span.span: Developers can override this method in a derived class to customize the process of saving personalization data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedWebPart As WebPart

summary.span: 获取对当前选择的用于编辑或用于创建与另一个控件的连接的 或其他服务器控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a or other server control that is currently selected for editing or for creating a connection with another control.

value.span: 当前选择的用于编辑或建立连接的 控件。

span.span: A control that is currently selected for editing or forming a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的引用或进行编辑或创建与另一个控件的连接当前所选其他服务器控件。The property returns a reference to a or other server control that is currently selected for editing or for creating a connection with another control. 控件提供了几个有用的方法和事件处理过程中选择一个控件。The control provides several useful methods and events for handling the process of selecting a control. 刚才所选控件后，但在进行任何更改之前发生的事件。The event occurs just after a control is selected, but before any changes are made. 若要发动控件上的某些操作，它在选定后，重写方法。To carry out some actions on the control after it is selected, override the method. 例如，你可能想要更改的控件选择但尚未，未更改以直观地强调所选控件的外观。For example, you might want to change the appearance of a control that is selected but has not changed yet, to emphasize visually which control is selected. 事件发生后已更改所选的控件。The event occurs just after the selected control has been changed. 若要更改后对其执行在控件上的某些操作，请重写方法。To carry out some actions on the control after it has changed, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedWebPartChanged As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: 在对一个 控件的选择已经发生更改并被移动到网页上的另一个控件之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the selection of one control has changed and moved to another control on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以结合使用此事件方法可以更改选定控件的用户界面 (UI)。This event can be used in conjunction with the method to change the user interface (UI) of a selected control. 例如，如果用户将页切换到设计模式下 ()，然后选择控件拖到新位置的意图，与很常见的呈现所选的控件，例如通过更改来更改的颜色其边框或背景处于选定状态时。For example, if the user switches the page to design mode (), and then selects a control with the intent of dragging it to a new position, it is common to change the rendering of the selected control, for example by changing the color of its border or background while it is selected. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedWebPartChanging As WebPartCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在更改网页上 或服务器控件当前的选定状态的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of changing which or server control is currently selected on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以结合使用此事件方法。This event can be used in conjunction with the method. 页开发人员可以通过添加在代码中创建事件处理程序`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`属性设为``页上，并将该属性的值设置为自定义方法的名称中的元素将处理该事件。Page developers can create an event handler in their code by adding the `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute to the `` element in a page, and setting the value of the attribute to the name of a custom method that will handle the event. 在开始或结束之间控件，并开始和结束时间的编辑控件的连接的过程中，将引发此事件。This event is raised during the process of beginning or ending a connection between controls, and when beginning and ending an edit of a control. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法。For details, see the method. 通常，当作为更改所选的控件的用户的操作的直接结果引发事件，可以取消该事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user's action that changes the selected control, the event can be cancelled. 但是，没有事件不能在其中被取消的方案。However, there is a scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled. 如果中删除控件，它包含的控件必须先结束所有，否则它们将被孤立。If a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在这种情况下控制关闭控件、 不用户，它必须确定当前选定哪个控件，以及何时更改而无需中断，不可能选择，以便它可以完成清除过程所有控件。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user, and it must determine which control is currently selected and when to change the selection without any chance of interruption, so that it can complete the process of cleaning up all the controls. 因此，根据设计方法不能在此情况下取消。Therefore, by design the method cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 可以取消的相关事件，请参阅事件。For a related event that can be cancelled, see the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetPersonalizationDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 设置一个标志，该标志指示 控件的自定义个性化设置数据已更改。

span.span: Sets a flag indicating that custom personalization data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置的个性化组件最终导致的 Web 部件控件集，以保存更新的个性化设置数据的标志。The method sets a flag that ultimately causes the personalization components in the Web Parts control set to save the updated personalization data. 有关详细信息可能会导致更改跟踪的个性化设置数据的方案控制，请参阅属性。For more information on the scenarios that can cause changes to the personalization data tracked by the control, see the property. 方法不能在代码中直接调用并不能重写，因为它在内部使用由 Web 部件控件集作为 Web 部件个性化功能的一部分。The method cannot be called directly from your code, and cannot be overridden, because it is used internally by the Web Parts control set as part of the Web Parts personalization feature.

para.span: 可以调用该方法由派生类。

span.span: The method can be called by a derived class.

para.span: 这会很有用，如果你想要自定义组件的 Web 部件控件集并因此需要控制设置标志个性化数据的过程个性化设置。

span.span: This would be useful if you want to customize the personalization components of the Web Parts control set, and thus need to control the process of setting flags for personalization data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetSelectedWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.span: 已被选择的 或服务器控件。

summary.span: 将 属性值设置为等于当前选定的 或服务器控件。

span.span: Sets the property value equal to the currently selected or server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间的开始或结束编辑指定的控件的进程调用方法`webPart`参数，并且那些开头或结尾包括连接`webPart`。The method is called during the processes that begin or end editing of the control specified by the `webPart` parameter, and those that begin or end a connection that includes `webPart`. 在编辑和连接过程中，开头`webPart`是以进行编辑，或输入连接已选择的控件。At the beginning of the edit and connection processes, `webPart` is the control that has been selected to be edited or to enter a connection. 在编辑和连接过程中，末尾`null`传递给方法，这会导致当前所选控件不再被选定。At the end of the edit and connection processes, `null` is passed to the method, which results in the currently selected control no longer being selected.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SkinID { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property SkinID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SkinID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个空字符串 ("")，使 控件不能应用任何外观。

span.span: Gets or sets an empty string ("") so that no skin can be applied to the control.

value.span: 一个空字符串，该字符串防止 控件使用指定给它的外观。

span.span: An empty string that prevents the control from having a skin assigned to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写继承属性可避免控件，这是不可见的控件中，从使用外观。The property overrides the inherited property to prevent the control, which is an invisible control, from using skins. 属性的实现可以防止外观通过始终返回空字符串从指定`get`访问器，并始终引发异常，尝试在中设置一个值是否`set`访问器。The implementation of the property prevents a skin from being assigned by always returning an empty string from the `get` accessor, and always throwing an exception if there is an attempt to set a value in the `set` accessor.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaticConnections As WebPartConnectionCollection

summary.span: 获取对网页上所有定义为静态连接的 对象的集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the collection of all objects on a Web page that are defined as static connections.

value.span: 一个 ，包含页上的所有静态连接。

span.span: A that contains all the static connections on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由控件来跟踪和管理页上的所有静态连接。The property is used by the control to track and manage all static connections on a page. 静态连接，与动态连接，相比不必添加到页面中，每次呈现页面。A static connection, in contrast with a dynamic connection, does not need to be added to a page every time the page is rendered. 此属性所引用的集合包含是否以编程方式创建或使用指定的页，存在的所有静态连接``页面的标记中的元素。The collection referenced by this property contains all the static connections that exist on the page, whether they are created programmatically or specified with an `` element in the page's markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 包含两个自定义网页可连接控件和``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码包含示例的网页部分。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 你还需要从示例部分获取例子-自定义用户控件和自定义控件和接口的源代码的前两个部分类概述。You will also need to obtain the first two parts of the example--the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls and interface--from the Example section of the class overview. 该主题还介绍了用于编译选项控件。That topic also explains your options for compiling the controls. 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 页的声明性标记包含`Register`为用户控制和自定义控件的指令。The declarative markup for the page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 没有``元素，``元素以包含自定义控件和``元素。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 请注意，在`Page_Load`方法，代码将检查来查看是否连接已存在并且，如果不是，定义提供程序、 一个使用者和它们各自的连接点，并且然后将新的连接添加到的一套所引用的静态连接属性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks to see whether a connection already exists and, if not, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 你已加载浏览器中的 Web 页后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**连接**切换页后，可以连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以启用你创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单中，，然后单击**连接**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 显示连接用户界面 (UI) 后，请注意，已由中包含的代码创建连接时`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method. 如果在更高版本的浏览器会话中返回此页，此静态连接将已建立，并且将不需要重新创建每次加载页面。If you return to this page in a later browser session, this static connection will already be established and will not need to be recreated each time the page loads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportedDisplayModes As WebPartDisplayModeCollection

summary.span: 获取特定网页上所有可用显示模式的只读集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are available on a particular Web page.

value.span: 一个 ，包含特定网页上的可用 对象集。

span.span: A that contains the set of objects available on a specific Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含实际可用在页中，给定的类型的页上存在的区域控件的显示模式。The property contains only the display modes that are actually available on a page, given the kinds of zone controls present on the page. > [!NOTE] > 可以禁用显示模式，并且当禁用的显示模式时，未添加到集合，即使该显示模式支持的区域的对应类型是在页上存在。Display modes can be disabled, and when a display mode is disabled, it is not added to the collection, even when the corresponding type of zone that supports that display mode is present on the page. 始终支持浏览模式和设计模式。Browse mode and design mode are always supported. 而异的显示模式是编辑、 目录和连接模式。The display modes that can vary are the edit, catalog, and connect modes. 其中每个显示模式是与特定类型的关联控件。Each of these display modes is associated with a particular type of control. 它是该特定类型的区域，在网页上导致一个要添加到所引用的集合的特定显示模式存在属性。It is the presence of that specially typed zone on a Web page that causes a particular display mode to be added to the collection referenced by the property. 例如，如果 Web 页包含但不是区域区域，然后编辑显示模式是一个受支持的模式，在该页上，但不是支持的目录的显示模式。For example, if a Web page contains an zone but not a zone, then the edit display mode is one of the supported modes on that page, but the catalog display mode is not supported. > [!NOTE] > 属性不同于属性，引用的集合包含与当前可用的所有显示模式控制，甚至那些不支持的特定页。The property differs from the property, which references a collection containing all the display modes that are available to the current control, even those that are not supported on a particular page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了以编程方式利用属性。The following code example shows the programmatic use of the property. 代码使用此属性来填充仅显示可用的模式在当前网页的列表。The code uses this property to populate the list with only the display modes available in the current Web page. 有三种受支持此页上的显示模式： 浏览、 设计和编辑。There are three supported display modes on this page: browse, design, and edit. 前两个始终可用，并且编辑模式是在此代码示例中可用，因为该页包含控件。The first two are always available, and the edit mode is available in this code example because the page contains an control. 目录和连接模式不在显示时，显示，因为它们的相应区域不在此页上。The catalog and connect display modes are not shown, because their corresponding zones are not on this page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes/CS/wpmgrSuppDisplayModescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes/VB/wpmgrSuppDisplayModesvb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，你可以使用下拉列表控件切换到设计模式，来自浏览模式的页，然后编辑模式。After you load the page in a browser, you can use the drop-down list control to switch the page from browse mode to design mode, and then to edit mode. 在编辑模式下，你可以单击每个服务器控件的标头中的下拉列表谓词菜单并选择**编辑**编辑该控件。In edit mode, you can click the drop-down verbs menu in the header of one of the server controls, and select **Edit** to edit the control.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean Implements IPersonalizable.IsDirty

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 控件管理的自定义个性化设置状态数据是否已在网页上更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether custom personalization state data managed by the control has changed on a Web page.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示个性化设置状态数据是否已更改。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the personalization state data has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供一种方法，以便调用方确定个性化状态由管理的数据是否控制已更改。The property provides a way for callers to determine whether personalization state data that is managed by the control has changed. 当用户个性化页级别的详细信息，例如通过更改页面布局、 创建或删除连接，并添加或删除控件，个性化数据由控制更改。When users personalize page-level details, for example by changing page layout, creating or deleting connections, and adding or deleting controls, the personalization data managed by the control changes. 这是受保护的值返回到调用方传递方法属性，无法由调用方直接访问该属性。This is a pass-through method that returns to callers the value of the protected property, which cannot be directly accessed by callers. > [!NOTE] > 属性不指示是否可个性化属性值或影响外观的个人的单独属性控件，已更改。The property does not indicate whether personalizable property values, or individual properties that affect the appearance of individual controls, have changed. 控制级别个性化会单独跟踪的每个控件。Control-level personalization is tracked for each control individually. 属性指示仅个性化数据，在页级别上是由控制已更改。The property indicates only whether personalization data that is at the page level and is managed by the control has changed. 以下列表描述了个性化的会导致某些常见实例属性返回的值`true`，以指示，控件具有某些更改的个性化数据：The following list describes some common instances of personalization that would cause the property to return a value of `true`, indicating that the control has some changed personalization data: - 关闭一个静态控件 （或服务器或用户控件） 在页面上。Closing a static control (or server or user control) on a page. - 还原已关闭的静态从页目录回页的控件。Restoring a closed static control from a page catalog back to a page. - 将在其区域内或向另一个区域移动任何控件。Moving any control within its zone or to another zone. - 将控件添加的目录从或服务器控件，或以编程方式添加控件。Adding a control from a catalog of or server controls, or adding a control programmatically. - 创建两个连接控制，以编程方式或通过使用连接用户界面 (UI)。Creating a connection between two controls, either programmatically or by using the connection user interface (UI). - 删除两个连接控制，以编程方式或通过使用连接用户界面。Deleting a connection between two controls, either programmatically or by using the connection UI. 若要访问此属性的值，必须强制转换控件实例与接口; 你可以然后读取属性值。To access this property value, you must cast the control instance to the interface; you can then read the property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的简单用法属性，以指示某些常见的页个性化实例导致控件的个性化设置数据更改。The following code example demonstrates a simple usage of the property, to indicate some common page personalization instances that cause a control's personalization data to change. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，可以更改包含 Web 部件控件的页面上的显示模式。A user control that allows you to change display modes on a page that contains Web Parts controls. - 包含两个自定义代码的源文件可连接控件和接口。A source file that contains the code for two custom controls that can be connected, and an interface. - 承载所有控件的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls. - 下面的代码示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the code example works. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 该示例的第二部分是使用自定义控件和接口的源文件。The second part of the example is the source file with the custom controls and the interface. 请注意，`IZipCode`接口公开一个方法，并且作为此方法实现在自定义的`ZipCodeWebPart`控件用作回调方法以启用`ZipCodeWebPart`充当连接方案中的提供程序。Notice that the `IZipCode` interface exposes one method, and that this method as implemented in the custom `ZipCodeWebPart` control serves as a callback method to enable `ZipCodeWebPart` to act as a provider in a connection scenario. 另一个控件， `WeatherWebPart`，连接中充当使用者控制; 它可以使用提供的特定界面`ZipCodeWebPart`。The other control, `WeatherWebPart`, acts as the consumer control in a connection; it can consume the particular interface provided by `ZipCodeWebPart`. 在实际应用中，`WeatherWebPart`无法使用提供程序，从一个个性化的邮政编码值，然后向用户提供图形天气信息。In a real application, `WeatherWebPart` could consume a personalized ZIP Code value from the provider, and then provide graphical weather information to users. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译;因此，请注意，`Register`指令以在 Web 页的顶部此组件只包含`TagPrefix`和`Namespace`属性，而不`Assembly`属性。This code example uses dynamic compilation; therefore, notice that the `Register` directive for this component at the top of the Web page contains only `TagPrefix` and `Namespace` attributes, without an `Assembly` attribute. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意，它包含两个区域，其中包含两个自定义第一个控件。Notice that it contains two zones, with the first one containing the two custom controls. 此外，还有区域，其中包含一种标准用户可添加到页面的控件。There is also a zone, which contains a standard control that users can add to the page. ``元素提供一个连接的用户控件之间创建连接的用户界面。The `` element provides a connection UI for users to create connections between controls. 在`Page_PreRender`方法，请注意，它会检查以查看是否个性化数据已更改，如果出现这种情况，将更新的文本`Label1`。In the `Page_PreRender` method, notice that it checks to see whether the personalization data has changed and, if so, updates the text of `Label1`. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/CS/wpmgrIsDirtyCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/VB/wpmgrIsDirtyVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，尝试创建的某些方案将更改个性化数据本主题的备注部分中列出。After you load the page in a browser, try to create some of the scenarios listed in the Remarks section of this topic that will change the personalization data. 当更改涉及跟踪的个性化设置方案之一时进行各种更改时控制的文本`Label1`显示控件以指示已更改个性化数据。As you make various changes, when a change involves one of the personalization scenarios tracked by the control, the text of the `Label1` control is displayed to indicate that personalization data has changed. 例如，你可以：For example, you can: - 通过单击控件之间创建连接**连接 web 部件控件**按钮。Create a connection between controls by clicking the **Connect WebPart Controls** button. - 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页切换到目录模式，并添加**我的日历**控件添加到第二个区域。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to catalog mode, and add the **My Calendar** control to the second zone. - 更改页更改要浏览模式，请单击 （显示具有标题栏中的箭头符号） 的谓词菜单的**我的日历**控件，并选择**关闭**关闭它并将其添加到页目录。Change the page back to browse mode, click on the verbs menu (shown with an arrow symbol in the title bar) for the **My Calendar** control, and select **Close** to close it and add it to the page catalog. - 使页返回到目录模式，并添加**我的日历**回页的控件。Return the page to catalog mode, and add the **My Calendar** control back to the page. - 使用**显示模式**控件将页切换到设计模式，并通过将一个或多个拖到另一个区域，或在同一区域中的不同位置重新排列控件的布局。Use the **Display Mode** control to switch the page to design mode, and rearrange the layout of the controls by dragging one or more of them to another zone, or to a different position in the same zone.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Load(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed
Sub Load (state As PersonalizationDictionary) Implements IPersonalizable.Load

param.name: state
param.span: 一个 ，它包含要加载的状态数据。

span.span: A that contains the state data to be loaded.

summary.span: 返回先前保存的需要加载到 控件的自定义个性化状态数据。

span.span: Returns previously saved custom personalization state data that needs to be loaded to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是实现的方法，为 Web 部件控件集直接访问受保护提供了一种方法方法。This method is an implementation of the method, which provides a way for the Web Parts control set to directly access the protected method. 当调用此方法时，它将存储由自定义个性化的数据控件，并且以前保存更高版本在初始化过程中使用的永久性的数据存储中。When this method is called, it stores the custom personalized data that is managed by the control, and that was previously saved in the permanent data store for use later in the initialization process. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，页和控件开发人员代码不必调用此方法，因为主要由 Web 部件控件集用作检索个性化设置数据的机制。In most cases, page and control developer code does not need to call this method, because it is primarily used by the Web Parts control set as its mechanism for retrieving personalization data.

para.span: 开发人员将在其中使用此方法的一种情况是如果他们正在开发一个自定义个性化框架，以代替其中一个提供由 Web 部件控件集。

span.span: One scenario in which developers would use this method is if they are developing a custom personalization framework to use in place of the one provided by the Web Parts control set.

para.span: 在这种情况下，开发人员无法从此继承类并重写方法返回的自定义实现对象。

span.span: In such cases, developers could inherit from the class and override the method to return a custom implementation of a object.

para.span: 自定义对象将调用的实现方法在适当的时间来加载自定义个性化数据。

span.span: The custom object would call the implementation of the method at the proper time to load custom personalization data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed
Sub Save (state As PersonalizationDictionary) Implements IPersonalizable.Save

param.name: state
param.span: 一个 ，包含待保存的状态数据。

span.span: A that contains the state data to be saved.

summary.span: 保存由 控件管理的自定义个性化设置状态数据。

span.span: Saves custom personalization state data that is managed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是实现的方法，为 Web 部件控件集直接访问受保护提供了一种方法方法。The method is an implementation of the method, which provides a way for the Web Parts control set to directly access the protected method. 当调用此方法时，它将保存由管理的所有个人的数据控件添加到为 Web 部件应用程序配置的永久性的数据存储。When this method is called, it saves all personalized data that is managed by the control to the permanent data store configured for a Web Parts application. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，页和控件开发人员代码不必调用此方法，因为主要由 Web 部件控件集用作保存个性化设置数据的机制。In most cases, page and control developer code does not need to call this method, because it is primarily used by the Web Parts control set as its mechanism for saving personalization data.

para.span: 开发人员将在其中使用此方法的一种情况是如果他们正在开发一个自定义个性化框架，以代替其中一个提供由 Web 部件控件集。

span.span: One scenario in which developers would work with this method is if they are developing a custom personalization framework to use in place of the one provided by the Web Parts control set.

para.span: 在这种情况下，开发人员无法从此继承类并重写方法返回的自定义实现对象。

span.span: In such cases, developers could inherit from the class and override the method to return a custom implementation of a object.

para.span: 自定义对象将调用的实现方法在适当的时间来保存自定义个性化数据。

span.span: The custom object would call the implementation of the method at the proper time to save the custom personalization data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 将个性化设置状态数据应用到 控件，调用基方法以便能够跟踪对控件视图状态数据的更改。

span.span: Applies personalization state data to the control, and calls the base method to enable tracking changes to the view-state data for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对视图状态数据的更改存储在对象，并可通过该控件的访问属性。The changes to the view-state data are stored in a object, and can be accessed through the control's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Visible { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Visible As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值可使子控件可见。

span.span: Gets a value that enables child controls to be visible.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示 控件及其子控件是否可见。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a control and its child controls are visible.

value.span: 在所有情况下均为 。

span.span: in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件重写基属性始终返回的值`true`为属性。The control overrides the base property to always return a value of `true` for the property. 即使控件本身不可见，请属性应设置为`true`，以便其所有子控件都都默认情况下可见。Even though the control itself is not visible, the property needs to be set to `true` so that all its child controls are visible by default. 如果你尝试设置的值属性，它始终生成错误，因为控件已重写基属性行为，并防止将任何值分配给属性。If you try to set the value of the property, it always generates an error because the control has overridden the base property behavior and prevents assigning any value to the property. 此属性在可视化设计器，可绑定并非是可在运行时绑定。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

exception.span: 尝试向该属性指定一个值。

span.span: An attempt was made to assign a value to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartAdded As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: 在动态 或其他服务器控件已被添加到 区域之后发生，以指示已成功添加了控件。

span.span: Occurs after a dynamic or other server control has been added to a zone, to indicate that the control was added successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件非常有用，该值指示动态控件 （而不是正在中的页标记声明，以编程方式添加控件） 已成功添加到区域。The event is useful for indicating that a dynamic control (a control added programmatically, as opposed to being declared in page markup) was successfully added to a zone. 结合方法，该事件提供了开发人员提供一种方法来更新用户界面 (UI) 或通知用户已成功添加控件。In conjunction with the method, the event provides developers with a way to update the user interface (UI) or otherwise notify users that a control was successfully added.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartAdding As WebPartAddingEventHandler

summary.span: 在向 区域添加动态 或其他服务器控件的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of adding a dynamic or other server control to a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发方法后将控件添加到区域的过程已开始。The event is raised by the method after the process of adding a control to a zone has begun. 此事件提供了机会在完成之前取消过程。This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete. 如果添加过程成功，此事件后跟事件。If the adding process is successful, this event is followed by the event. 页开发人员可以通过添加为事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartAdding`属性设为``页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartClosed As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: 当从页中移除 控件（或服务器控件，或用户控件）时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control (or server or user control) is removed from a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件指示，控件已成功关闭，由用户或以编程方式。The event indicates that a control has been successfully closed, either by a user or programmatically. 若要关闭控件意味着若要删除从页以便不呈现，并且还将其放在一个特殊持有对象调用页目录。To close a control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog. 对应于一个页目录控制，维护对已关闭的引用为每个页的控件。A page catalog, which corresponds to the control, maintains references to closed controls for each page. 如果控件声明内的网页区域，用户可以将页切换到目录的显示模式，并将以前关闭任何控件添加回页面。If a control is declared on a page within a zone, users can switch a page into catalog display mode, and add back to a page any controls that were previously closed. 与关联事件方法，它同时引发事件，并为其提供一个处理程序。The event is associated with the method, which both raises the event and provides a handler for it. 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartClosed`属性设为``页，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartClosing As WebPartCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在从页中移除 控件（或服务器控件，或用户控件）的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of removing a control (or server or user control) from a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发方法时控件正在关闭一个控件。The event is raised by the method when the control is in the process of closing a control. 如果该控件的删除操作成功，此事件后跟事件。If the removal of the control is successful, this event is followed by the event. 页开发人员可以通过添加为事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartClosed`属性设为 <`asp:webpartmanager>`页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can provide a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 通常，当作为用户结束的直接结果引发事件控件，可以取消该事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user closing a control, the event can be cancelled. 但是，没有事件不能在其中被取消的方案。However, there is a scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled. 如果中删除控件，它包含的控件必须先结束所有，否则它们将被孤立。If a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在这种情况下控制关闭控制，不是用户。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user. 以及何时控件正在调用方法来关闭每个控件，与引发事件，事件不能被取消 （按照设计），因为需要完成的清理任务所有区域的控件。And when the control is in the process of calling the method to close each control, and the event is raised, the event cannot be cancelled (by design) because the needs to complete the task of cleaning up all the zone's controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发方法，在删除动态控件 （通过编程方式或通过 Web 部件用户界面的用户已添加的控件） 的过程。The event is raised by the method, during the process of deleting a dynamic control (one that has been added programmatically or by a user through the Web Parts user interface). 事件提供了机会在它完成之前取消过程。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is finished. 如果成功完成删除过程，此事件后跟事件。If the deletion process is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 页开发人员可以通过添加为事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartDeleting`属性设为``页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

summary.span: 在 或服务器控件已被移动到网页上的不同位置之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a or server control has been moved to a different location on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件同时适用于静态 （在网页上的标记中声明） 和动态控件。This event applies to both static (declared in the markup of a Web page) and dynamic controls. 与之关联方法。It is associated with the method. 因为引发事件时完成移动后，开发人员可以包含事件处理程序来提供某些通知提供给用户、 一些验证或某些其他操作。Because the event is raised after a move is complete, developers can include an event handler to provide some notification to users, some validation, or some other actions. 若要添加事件处理程序，你可以添加`OnWebPartMoved`属性设为``页上，并将赋给特性的自定义方法的名称中的元素。To add an event handler, you can add an `OnWebPartMoved` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assign the name of a custom method to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartMoving As WebPartMovingEventHandler

summary.span: 在移动 区域中包含的 或其他服务器控件的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of moving a or other server control that is contained in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时或在其自己的区域内或另一个区域，将被移其他服务器控件。The event is raised when a or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone. 当用户拖动控件，或以编程方式移动时，则可以发生此情况。This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move. 事件由引发方法，并提供机会在完成之前取消移动的过程。The event is raised by the method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete. 如果移动已完成，控件已放置在新位置，此事件后跟事件。If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the event. 页开发人员可以创建自定义事件处理程序，通过添加`OnWebPartMoving`属性设为``元素，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebParts As WebPartCollection

summary.span: 获取对网页上的 控件所跟踪的所有 控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to all controls tracked by the control on a Web page.

value.span: 一个 ，包含对一组 控件的引用。

span.span: A that contains references to a set of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由控件跟踪所有中包含的控件页上的区域。The property is used by the control to track all controls that are contained within zones on the page. 尽管该集合是只读的你可以访问单个以编程方式控制通过对它们的集合并进行更改。Although the collection is read-only, you can access individual controls through the collection and make changes to them programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 可以具有控件将外部的页面上放置区域，这会导致控件未跟踪控制或中引用其集合。It is possible to have a control placed on a page outside of a zone, which results in the control not being tracked by the control or referenced in its collection. 但是，很少使用管理区域，之外，因为它然后丢失其 Web 部件功能并作为正常的服务器控件。However, there is little reason to use a control outside of a zone, because it then loses its Web Parts functionality and acts as a normal server control. 任何类型的控件，无论是自定义可以放置在区域中，控件、 标准 ASP.NET 控件、 一个用户控件或自定义服务器控件，可以被视为控件在运行时。Any type of control that can be placed in a zone, whether a custom control, a standard ASP.NET control, a user control, or a custom server control, can be treated as a control at run time. 不是控件时控件放入区域，在 ASP.NET 包装控件的运行时对象，以便控件可以具有的行为与真正控件。When a control that is not a control is placed in a zone, at run time ASP.NET wraps the control with a object, so that the control can behave as a true control. 因此，通过使用属性，控件可以跟踪任何类型的服务器控件，无论它派生自类。Therefore, by using the property, the control can track any type of server control, regardless of whether it derives from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式来访问各控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to access individual controls. 请注意，在 Web 页中，声明性标记内``元素中，有是两个标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件。Notice that in the declarative markup for the Web page, within the `` element there are two standard ASP.NET server controls. 虽然这些不是继承自类，因为它们处于它们将自动换行与区域对象在运行时，并因此将包含所引用的集合在属性。Although these do not inherit from the class, because they are in a zone they will be wrapped with a object at run time, and thus will be included in the collection referenced by the property. 您也可以添加自定义控件、 用户控件或自定义服务器控制在此区域中，并且它们将进行处理相同的方式。You could also add custom controls, user controls, or custom server controls in this zone, and they would be handled the same way. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts/CS/wpmgrWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts/VB/wpmgrWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 请注意，为代码的示例正常工作，必须添加的设置在 Web.config 文件，以使导出 Web 部件描述文件中。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 确保你有此代码示例为 Web 页相同的目录中的 Web.config 文件。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 在``部分中，请确保有``具有元素`enableExport`属性设置为`true`，如下所示的以下标记。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 如果您单击将页加载到浏览器中之后, **web 部件计数**按钮，该代码使用属性以返回集合中的控件的计数。After you load the page into a browser, if you click the **WebPart Count** button, the code uses the property to return the count of controls in the collection. 如果你单击**隐藏日历标题**按钮，代码将日历更改，以便带仅边框和标题不呈现。If you click the **Hide Calendar Title** button, the code changes the calendar so that it renders with only a border and not a title.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsConnected As WebPartConnectionsEventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件（或者服务器或用户控件）之间已建立特定连接之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a specific connection has been established between controls (or server or user controls).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与关联事件方法。The event is associated with the method. 此事件非常有用，因为你知道连接已完成后，你可能想要通知的事实，用户或甚至更改页面的用户界面 (UI)。The event is useful because after you know that a connection is complete, you might want to inform the user of the fact, or even change the user interface (UI) of the page. 例如，你可能想要显示某个提供两个控件之间的成功连接的建议的图形图像或显示简要的消息，，然后在各个页面显示模式回浏览模式。For example, you might want to display some graphic image that suggests a successful connection between two controls, or display a brief message, and then change the page display mode back to browse mode. 页开发人员可以通过添加与此事件关联的自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartsConnected`属性设为``页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can associate a custom event handler with this event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute to the `` element in the page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsConnecting As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在创建 控件（或放置在 区域中的服务器控件或用户控件）之间的连接的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of creating a connection between controls (or server or user controls placed in a zone).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发方法，并且它表明连接过程已开始 （例如，用户已选择了某个控件并单击连接谓词），但尚未完成。The event is raised by the method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed. 事件提供了机会在完成之前取消连接。The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete. 如果连接成功完成，此事件后跟事件。If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartsConnecting`属性设为``元素，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnecting` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsDisconnected As WebPartConnectionsEventHandler

summary.span: 在两个 或服务器控件之间的连接已终止之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a connection between two or server controls has been terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与关联事件方法。The event is associated with the method. 此事件非常有用，因为你知道连接终止后，你可能想要通知用户，在代码中，执行某些清除操作或在用户界面 (UI) 中进行其他更改。The event is useful because after you know that a connection is terminated, you might want to inform the user, perform some cleanup actions in the code, or make other changes in the user interface (UI). 页开发人员可以通过添加与此事件关联的自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartsDisConnected`属性设为``页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can associate a custom event handler with this event by adding the `OnWebPartsDisConnected` attribute to the `` element in the page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsDisconnecting As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在结束以前连接的 或服务器控件之间的连接的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of ending the connection between previously connected or server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发方法，并表明这样的事实用户已单击断开连接的谓词，或否则调用方法。The event is raised by the method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the method has otherwise been called. 事件提供了机会取消完成之前结束连接的过程。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete. 如果连接由于成功结束，此事件后跟事件。If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the event. 页开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartsDisconnecting`属性设为``元素，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 通常，当作为结束连接的用户的操作的直接结果引发事件，可以取消该事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user's action that ends a connection, the event can be cancelled. 但是，有几种应用场景中的事件不能被取消。However, there are several scenarios in which the event cannot be cancelled. 第一个方案是，如果中删除控件，它包含的控件必须先结束所有，否则它们将被孤立。The first scenario is, if a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在这种情况下控制关闭控件，不用户，和它必须还能够以终止绝不会遭受的中断，任何连接的控件的连接，以便它可以完成清理和关闭的过程所有控件。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user, and it must also be able to terminate the connections of any connected controls without any chance of interruption, so that it can complete the process of cleaning up and closing all the controls. 因此，根据设计方法不能在此情况下取消。Therefore, by design the method cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 可以取消的相关事件，请参阅事件。For a related event that can be cancelled, see the event. 在其中第二个方案事件不能被取消时调用方法时 （这在到页中，每个请求过程中例如调用），并且没有某种类型的页上的现有连接中的冲突。The second scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled is when the method is called (this called during each request to a page, for example), and there is some type of conflict in the existing connections on a page. 例如，用户可能是连接到控件 y 的控件 x 但控件 x 来控制 z，共享的用户连接和尚未控件 x 不允许进行多个连接。For example, perhaps a user connects control x to control y, but a shared user connects control x to control z, and yet control x is not allowed to form multiple connections. 在这种情况下，连接的每个用户的设置优先，和控件将解决冲突，通过调用方法和结束之间的连接 x 和 z 适用于特定用户。In this case, the individual user's settings for the connection take precedence, and the control resolves the conflict by calling the method and ending the connection between x and z for the particular user. 因为此断开连接是至关重要的设计来解决冲突时，事件不能在此方案中被取消。Because this disconnection is essential to resolving the conflict, by design the event cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 在其中的第三个方案方法不能取消时或删除或关闭当前连接的服务器控件。The third scenario in which the method cannot be cancelled is when a or server control that is currently connected is either deleted or closed. 由于控件肯定会从此页中删除，它是逻辑必不可少若要删除其连接的。Because the control is definitely going to be removed from the page, it is a logical necessity to remove its connection. 因此，当控件时，将调用方法，该方法引发事件，根据设计是不可能不存在，可取消事件。Therefore, when the control invokes the method, which in turn raises the event, by design there is no possibility of canceling the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Zones As WebPartZoneCollection

summary.span: 获取对网页上所有 区域的集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of all the zones on a Web page.

value.span: 引用一组 区域的 。

span.span: A that references a set of zones.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由控件跟踪在网页上的区域。The property is used by the control to track the zones on a Web page. 请注意属性不引用所有类型的区域;它引用派生自的区域类，其中包括区域。Note that the property does not reference all types of zones; it references only zones that derive from the class, including zones. 尽管该属性引用的集合是只读的但可以使用它可以访问集合中的单个对象，并以编程方式使用它们。Although the collection referenced by the property is read-only, you can use it to access the individual objects in the collection and work with them programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式来访问各区域控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to access individual zone controls. 请注意，在声明性 Web 页标记中，有两个``每个包含服务器控件的元素。Notice that in the declarative markup for the Web page, there are two `` elements, each containing a server control. 在`
